title: The Control Performance podcast series
description: A typical plant is losing millions annually from poorly-performing control systems.  Typically, 20-30% of controls are in manual mode.  Up to 85% of control loops have sub-optimal settings.  20-40% of controllers are oscillating, adding to plant variability, and hurting reliability.  With so many issues, it can be hard to monitor, prioritize, and resolve issues.

title: The Mix
description:
Andy and Kishan, two sophomores from Yale bring on guests from all around the world to discuss a wide range of issues such as political correctness, economics, and computer science.

Andy was born in Florida to two immigrants from China who came to America seeking a better life. As a he grew older, he became more aware of political issues involving immigration, economic inequality, and education. In his free time, he enjoys trading stocks, coding, and reading. Now at Yale, he's studying Computer Science and Economics, hoping to one day find his own business.

Kishan was raised in Upstate New York to two immigrants from Zambia and India. His parents ran a small motel business and through these experiences, he came to appreciate the values of hard work and determination. Kishan competed in FIRST Robotics and qualified two times in a row to attend the international championship. Now at Yale he is double majoring in computer science and statistics & data science, hoping to attend law school and pursue a career in tech policy.

title: The POGIL Podcast
description:
“The POGIL Podcast” is a new conversation from The POGIL Project that celebrates innovative educators, both in and out of the classroom. You will hear about what inspired them to become teachers, and how the practice of student-centered education transformed their classrooms and improved outcomes for their students. Learn how they’re innovating outside of the classroom as well! 

Join us as we “think out loud” with POGIL educators, researchers, and others working to transform teaching and learning for the 21st century. 
 
POGIL stands for Process Oriented Guided Inquiry Learning, a student-centered approach that guides students in constructing their own understanding of content and helps them develop important skills such as teamwork, communication, critical thinking, and problem solving.

Thanks for joining us and we look forward to bringing you great conversations from The POGIL Podcast!

PDH continuously pushes the boundaries of technology innovation in scholarly publication and ecosystem practices to bring trust, transparency, and truth to its audience, publishing the peer review journals Blockchain in Healthcare Today and Telehealth and Medicine Today.

Dobrej ročník - O životě. O generaci třicátníků. O tom, jak jsme se potkali na škole. O tom, proč a jak a co děláme. O Architektuře. O tom, co nás čeká dál. Společně s Růžou

title: TechnoViews
description:
TechnoViews features interviews with humanities and social science scholars on a wide range of topics at the intersection between science, technology, and society in the 21st century. Our podcast episodes provide a more in-depth understanding of the major challenges of living in a world that is increasingly dominated by global articulations of technoscience. Available in all major podcast platforms, including Spotify, Google Podcasts, and Apple Podcasts, among others. TechnoViews is produced by the Sci-Tech Asia International Research Network and is supported by the Research Cluster “Technoscience, Society, and Environment” of the Research Center for Anthropology and Health at the University of Coimbra.

Podcast Team: Joseph BOSCO, Gonçalo D. SANTOS, Nicolas STERNSDORFF-CISTERNA, and Jun ZHANG

title: Frecuencia Resiliencia
description:
Ciberataques, huracánes devastadores, pandemia y otros recién eventos mayores nos han recordado que de un momento a otro, todo puede cambiar. La resiliencia se presenta como una palabra mágica ante las crisis que han seguidos estos desastres. Pero como profesional de resiliencia organizacional, estoy convencido que debemos aprender más sobre la resiliencia para entender lo que puede significar para nosotros, especialmente para las empresas, comunidades y gobiernos, y como nos puede ayudar para enfrentar y superar situaciones dramáticas, sin “trucos de magia”. 

Soy su host, Timothé Graziani, Gerente General de Capresiliencia y les deseo una cordial bienvenida en Frecuencia Resiliencia. 

Frecuencia Resiliencia es el nuevo podcast donde hablaremos con pasión, profesionalismo y diversión de los dominios y temas actuales relacionados con la Resiliencia Organizacional. Sean profesionales de la continuidad del negocio, la seguridad de la información o de la gestión de riesgos, les esperamos aquí por un momento especial con Félix, Pedro y muchos más expertos, quienes animarán de forma regular esta nueva emisora.

Top 10 Dental Implants Podcast 
https://blog.feedspot.com/dental_implant_podcasts/

 Dr. Sean owns and operates several Dental practices and opened 4M Institute .But What Is Teeth In One Day?
Included with your full-mouth Teeth in one Day procedure, are two sets of permanent teeth 

During your pre-op appointments we will take scans, X-rays, and impressions in addition to lengthy discussing with the doctor your smile goals. With this information our lab will create your healing set of teeth. 

After your implants are in, you will be fitted and sent home with your permanent  set of teeth Next day . These are what you’ll have while your body is healing from surgery and osseointegration takes place. Osseointegration is the fusing of the implant to the bone.

title: AIAA Los Angeles - Las Vegas Section Podcast
description:
AIAA is non-profit 501(c)3 professional organization promoting aerospace. Our purpose is to ignite and celebrate aerospace ingenuity and collaboration, and its importance to our way of life. Our promise is to be your vital lifelong link to the aerospace community and a champion for its achievements.

One Remarkable Fact Says It All: Since 1963, members from a single professional society have achieved virtually every milestone in modern American flight. That society is the American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics. With nearly 30,000 individual members from 91 countries, and 95 corporate members, AIAA is the world’s largest technical society dedicated to the global aerospace profession. Created in 1963 by the merger of the two great aerospace societies of the day, the American Rocket Society (founded in 1930 as the American Interplanetary Society), and the Institute of the Aerospace Sciences (established in 1933 as the Institute of the Aeronautical Sciences), AIAA carries forth a proud tradition of more than 80 years of aerospace leadership.

The Los Angeles – Las Vegas Section is a community of 7000+ Aerospace Professionals, providing services to the communities from Los Angeles to Las Vegas, including San Bernardino and Riverside. Southern California and Las Vegas area has lots of aerospace organizations add activities, and is the center of American aerospace.

title: The Unplugged Debate
description:
Welcome to The Unplugged Debate, on this podcast we delve into the ideas that surround human’s interaction with both nature and technology.
Talking to people about their time in the outdoors. Starting from when they were younger all the way through to present day.
Developing a picture on who and what motivates them to be outside and why they do the things they do in the outdoors. Crossing over into talking about their technology usage and how that has changed throughout their life. 
Speaking to them about the different types of technology they use on a day to day basis from their mobile phones to the running shoes.
Once we’ve developed a good picture of them, we incorporate that into how they think technology has changed their outlook on life and their time in the outdoors and how they think technological develop has changed society on a wider scale.

title: Glasser Series Audiobooks - A Death Worse Than Dying
description:
Draper’s Girl is attempting to fall off the grid, but time off or ‘personal time’ doesn’t exist within the Organization. Additionally, her secret sabbatical and therapy sessions are working … bringing up long buried memories and horrors of her childhood. With a trove of data she’s acquired from Draper, she flirts with the idea of Accelerating - the method Jack Glasser uses in his research - in an attempt to make sense of it all.
 
Concurrently, Amin suffers a devastating loss in Atlanta, pulling in Luke, Chas and Quan in an attempt to unravel two mystery deaths. Slowly and painfully, they peel back layers of a larger conspiracy to defraud a church … a plan crafted by Organization members.
 
When Draper’s Girl’s trail leads back to Atlanta as well, once again she finds her fate intertwined with the Glassers and their employees. For Amin and Draper’s Girl, closure seems distant, but with each body that drops, they come closer to the truth.

Future episodes will feature prominent figures in the Neurotechnology field, so make sure you subscribe to us on Stitcher, Google Play, or Apple Podcasts to stay up to date!

Harrison and Colin (The BCI Guys) are neurotech researchers and entrepreneurs dedicated to creating a brain-controlled future! Neurotechnology and brain-computer interfaces are devices that allow users to control machines with their thoughts and interact with technology in new ways. This revolutionary technology will change life as we know it, and soon will be as common as the touchscreen on your smartphone. Join us in learning about the brain-controlled future!

Support Us: https://www.bciguys.com/support

title: J'explique la technologie très simplement

Diplômé d'une école d'ingénieur, j'ai été  responsable du département Networking chez IBM  et élu meilleur manager en 1997.  
Entrepreneur : j'ai levé des fonds en 2000 et j'ai fondé une PME de développements dans l'Internet que ma fille ainée dirige  avec succès aujourd'hui . 
40 ans de carrière dans l'informatique : ce sont des milliers de rencontres, des succès  , des échecs mais surtout le plaisir d'être dans un domaine sans cesse en évolution . Jeunes et moins jeunes , je suis là pour vous donner envie de comprendre la technologie, alors n'hésitez pas à regarder ma chaine et à me poser vos questions !

title: The Woodshed: A Musculoskeletal Podcast
description:
My name is Lester S. Duplechan, MD, and welcome to my podcast. I’m an academic physiatrist and division director in Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation—with a keen interest and over 25 years of experience in musculoskeletal medicine practice. 
I plan on discussing both common and uncommon clinical musculoskeletal topics, practice management, as well as interviews with other MSK nerds and super-specialists. There will also be some trivia, both regarding MSK, as well as my other interests including sports and music.

Feel free to reach out to us at the Woodshed at my email address>>

“ duplechanmskus@gmail.com”

Or visit my YouTube channel at “Duplechan Musculoskeletal Ultrasound”
Until then..
Keep burning the midnight lamp…

title: #InsuringIndia - A Digit Insurance Podcast
description:
Unlike before, understanding insurance is no longer a cumbersome task. Companies like us are focused on simplifying insurance. In fact, the endeavour is to ensure that even 15-year-old kids are able to understand policy documents. Our ultimate goal is to cut through the clutter and make insurance more accessible.

Through #InsuringIndia, we aim to: 
A) Highlight the latest insurance trends
B) Debug popular myths around insurance
C) Break down complex jargon
D) Improve the perception around insurance products to bring back the trust 
And most importantly, make insurance fun and interesting! 

Watch this space! Episodes out every month, starting 17th January.

title: Millennial Z and Boomer X
description:
A twice weekly Podcast with an adult son and father discussing the world and all things within one topic at a time.  People will receive the thoughts, perceptions and expressions of the son, Millennial Z, born at the end of the Millennial generation and the beginning of Generation Z, and the father, born at the end of the Boomer generation and the beginning of Generation X.  Each is thoroughly a hybrid of their respective generation margins and all that entails.  Even though they are alike in many aspects, they quite obviously see the world differently, think from a different time, culture and paradigm, and act from an entirely different framework and relationship with life.  Please join us for twice weekly podcasts on subjects that concern all of us. We talk about what you talk about. Thank you for listening!

Email:  MillennialZandBoomerX@gmail.com

title: Inclusive & Online Podcast
description:
The Inclusive & Online Podcast is a monthly podcast where your hosts, Kate Huttenlocher, Kayla Yucha, and Dan Arnold, will discuss topics relating to inclusivity, educational technology, and online learning. Join us for lively discussion of relevant topics, poignant interviews, and for recommendations on tech tools that will help you create the inclusive environments that you seek in your classrooms and beyond. 

Kate Huttenlocher, MA, LLPC (she/her/hers)

Working toward open mindedness, inclusivity, and being able to meet people where they are at has been a part of my journey at every step both personally and professionally. After working in K-8 education for a time, I decided to pursue a Master’s in Counseling from Oakland University. It was at this point that I began working as a graduate assistant in e-Learning before becoming full time staff of Oakland University’s e-Learning and Instructional Support office during the COVID-19 pandemic. I have been serving as the Assistant Manager of Support Services at e-LIS since January 2021. Working in e-Learning has given me the opportunity to explore the ways in which we can make education more inclusive and accessible for all students. Outside of work, I enjoy frequenting local coffee shops, spending time with my cats, and am an avid podcast listener. 

Dan Arnold, Ph.D. (he/him/his)

I’m Dr. Dan and I’m the Manager of Support Services for Oakland University’s e-Learning and Instructional Support team. With over 17 years of higher education experience ranging from student financial aid, to student recruitment, to online learning, I have worked with a wide range of students and colleagues over the years. My journey toward learning more about inclusion started while working on my doctorate, and has continued to this day. I enjoy thinking about and enacting ways for all learning environments to be more inclusive. On a personal note, I like snacks, sports, and dogs. 

Kayla Yucha (she/her/hers)

I am Kayla and I am a junior year marketing student at Oakland University! I currently work at the e-Learning and Instructional Support office as their lead tech on the team, and this is my third year working at the office. Living on campus, and working with the campus community everyday at e-LIS has furthered my passion for cultivating inclusivity within both the technology realm and in everyday life. During my free time, I enjoy reading, all things fashion, and crocheting!
author_name: Dan Arnold, Kayla Yucha, & Kate Huttenlocher

title: First Things First
description:
We live in a consumer driven world. $2.5T worth of products are imported annually, representing 15% of U.S. GDP. It’s time companies become fully connected to the people who make and move our products, and look for ways to improve the way we plan, buy, and move them around the world.

First Things First is a supply chain show with a focus on the first mile, hosted by industry thought leader and Mercado CEO Robert Garrison.

Each episode, Rob invites a guest to share their insight on how businesses can better navigate the complexities of the global supply chain by automating and connecting their first mile operations. 

Available wherever you get your podcasts.

title: MILC Club Podcast
description:
MILC Club Podcast
Egy rádió műsor azoknak, akiket érdekel a fotózás, azon belül is a MILC fényképezőgépek világa.
Mi az a MILC?
A MILC (Mirrorless Interchangeable Lens Camera) egy fényképezőgép kategória, ami a tükör elhagyásával kisebb méretben is túlszárnyalja a tükörreflexes fényképezőgépeknél megszokott képminőséget és sokoldalúságot. Adásainkban hétről hétre mindig új témákat, új eszközöket mutatunk be, meghívott szakértő vendégeink elmesélik a MILC gépeikhez fűződő tapasztalataikat és élményeiket és kulisszatitkokat. Kövess minket, hogy Te is részese lehess a MILC életérzésnek!

title: כל היום אני משווקת וזה לא קל! עם טובית לייכטר
description: יום אחד החלטתי להפוך מעובדת סוציאלית למנהלת סושיאל(ית)ומלווה עסקים בשיווק.מה שלא ידעתי זה שהכל יקרה תוך כדי אתגרים משפחתיים,מגיפה עולמית, ומה לא בעצם. אני הולכת לחלוק איתכם איך התמודדתי עם המעבר מלהיות שכירה לבעלת עסק, איך לבצע תוכנית שיווק ולהגדיל הכנסות, על מאחורי הקלעים של השיווק, על פספוסים וטעויות  וגם-איך לקום ולהמשיך-יום יום עם העסק שלנו. בנוסף אני  יארח בעלי עסקים שאני לוקחת מהם השראה. בואו- יהיה מעניין, מרגש וסושיאלי במיוחד!

title: The Voices Project Dialogue Series
description:
As parts of the world begin to turn the corner on the covid-19 pandemic, pressing questions will emerge. What does a post-pandemic healthcare system look like? Join our Voices Project Dialogue as we take a look at multilateral perspectives that stem from Asia but contextualise the World. I'll examine the vulnerabilities and opportunities that this next normal in health will force us to contend with. 

Over the course of the episodes, policymakers, healthcare providers, academics and scientists will come together alongwith representatives from industry, patient associations, charities and the finance sector to examine issues such as:  Financial rollout hurdles, community-driven policies, public/private barriers to engagement, inequity & accessibility, the challenge of living with co-morbidities, the post-covid cancer surge, financial exclusion, digital innovation for development sector prioritisation, climate-induced respiratory illnesses, mental health and much more.

Our guests are sharing their journey in an organic conversation with our host that starts from their initial inspiration, zooming in on the problem and looking to the future. We hope to reflect, share nuggets of wisdom and laugh a little about the not so funny moments that have happened.

description: Today, the world is demanding more of products and packaging: they need to meet consumer demands, be sustainable, and travel through complex supply chains. In this podcast, we’ll interview experts and industry leaders across food, beauty, CPG, and industrials. We’re going to go beyond the shelf and get behind-the-scenes insights into what goes into making the products you use everyday. We’ll cover everything from product innovation to packaging sustainability and how leaders are thinking about enabling their next generation workforce. We’re going to have a lot of fun and learn new things along the way. So be sure to subscribe and get ready to go “beyond the shelf!" title: KI im Mittelstand
description: Künstliche Intelligenz wird mittlerweile überall im täglichen Gebrauch eingesetzt: In der Sprachsteuerung auf dem Handy, im Navi oder in unserem E-Mail-Postfach. Doch wie können KI-Technologien auch in Industrien eingesetzt werden? Vor welchen Herausforderungen stehen die Industrien und welche Anwendungsfälle sind für welchen Bereich relevant? Mit diesen und weiteren Fragen beschäftigt sich der Podcast "KI im Mittelstand". Hierzu laden Robert Kaletsch (Co-Founder von Kineo.ai) und Svenja Schölermann (Sales Managerin bei Kineo.ai) regelmäßig spannende Ansprechpartner:innen ein.

This podcast is designed to invoke thought and discussion about these topics and get us all to ask ourselves "wait a second, what really happened there?"  Enjoy!

Die Inhalte stellen meine persönlichen Ansichten dar und sollten nicht als allgemeingültige, belastbare Aussagen verstanden werden. IT-SKUNK-WORKS ist eine inoffizielle "Interessengruppe", in der Ideen zur Zukunft von IT frei ausgetauscht werden.

Aus offensichtlichen Gründen verweisen wir auf Skunk Works, als Pseudonym für das Advanced Development Program von Lockheed Martin. Diese Organisation hat mit ihren Innovationen die Luftfahrtindustrie maßgeblich geprägt. Grundlage dafür war ein Maximum an Autonomie und ein Minimum an Bürokratie. description:

Wrangle the data like a pro into a format suitable for analysis. Then calculate statistics to your heart's galore. Furthermore, learn how to build forecasting and prediction models to get an upper-hand on your competition.

At the Cannabis Data Science meetup, you can join like-minded individuals, learn modern data science techniques, and go through hands-on exercises with real cannabis data. This is a great opportunity for anyone in a cannabis-testing lab, anyone working at a cannabis cultivation or processing plant, any cannabis retailer, and even any cannabis researcher or consumer seeking knowledge. Please join us for a coffee, I like tea, for a fun time crunching cannabis numbers. We follow the value for value principle, so if you find value then you may consider donating so the Cannlytics team can continue to provide you with value.

title: Too Bad I Hid A Boot - ASMR
description:
Welcome to T.B.I.H.A.B. ASMR podcast, where we invite you to sit back, relax, and let the sounds transport you to a world of pure relaxation and tranquility, even curiosity.

Our goal is to create an immersive audio experience that engages all your senses, taking you on a journey through a variety of environments and situations. From the hustle and bustle of a busy city street, the calming sounds of the woods, a desert night under the starts, even the soundscapes of a manufacturing process, for some of the amazing devices you use every day.

We use binaural audio technology to create a 3D sound experience that simulates the way sound waves travel to your ears in real life, creating a sense of depth and immersion. This allows you to feel like you are actually in the environment we are creating.

Whether you want to unwind after a long day or just need a break from the chaos of the world around you, our podcast is here to provide a space of relaxation and escape. We will take you on a journey from the beginning to the end, and even backwards, exploring all kinds of soundscapes and situations. Possibly take a nap on the plane, or in a tent in the woods.

So, close your eyes, take a deep breath, and let us transport you to a world of pure audio bliss.

Please consider sending a donation if you enjoy this experience or subscribing on Patreon to help support our podcast and avoid sponsor breaks and the acquisition of microphones. More ASMR experiences to come!

Grab Tracks & Albums @ https://urbansurroundings.bandcamp.com/ https://www.patreon.com/TooBadIHidABoot .

description: Making Resilience Cool is a podcast brought to you by the US Resiliency Council, based on the 12-episode Resilience Advantage series created by the USRC with the generous support of Optimum Seismic. Evan Reis, a Structural Engineer and the co-founder of the USRC, walks us through different aspects of resilience, and interviews special guests that include engineers, architects, business and community leaders, and sustainability experts, who share their insights on the importance of resilient design. title: 7-Gründe warum Sie Arbeitssicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz digitalisieren sollten
description:
7 Gründe, warum Sie Arbeitssicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz digitalisieren sollten.

Arbeitssicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz hat in allen Branchen oberste Priorität und sollte von allen Mitarbeitenden, vom Arbeitnehmer bis zum Arbeitgeber gelebt werden. Auch gibt es viele Gesetze und Richtlinien, welche es zu berücksichtigen und einzuhalten gilt. Ein Verstoss gegen dies Gesetzte oder Richtlinien der Arbeitssicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz, kann auch Ihrem Unternehmen eventuell teuer zu stehen kommen. Zur Umsetzung aller Vorgaben braucht es einiges an Kommunikation, Dokumentation und Organisation. Da kann man schon mal den Überblick verlieren, und dadurch indirekt auch die Rechtskonformität.

Wir nennen Ihnen im Folgenden sieben Gründe, weshalb die Digitalisierung der Arbeitssicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz auch für Sie viele Potential mitbringt.

title: People, Planet, Progress - Be SEWstainable!
description:
Essere sostenibili significa adottare uno stile di vita consapevole e responsabile, in cui persone e tecnologie cooperano per il benessere del contesto economico e sociale e nel rispetto dell’ambiente. Partendo da tali presupposti, il cammino verso la sostenibilità si concretizza grazie alla capacità di integrare nella strategia aziendale, nei processi e nelle soluzioni tecnologiche anche driver come la tutela dell’ambiente e il rispetto delle persone, al fine di generare valore in una prospettiva di lungo periodo.

“Be SEWstainable!” è l’approccio di SEW-EURODRIVE per uno sviluppo aziendale a tutela del contesto socio-economico, ma anche una promessa per preservare le risorse energetiche e ridurre gli impatti ambientali attraverso lo sviluppo e la diffusione di tecnologie che tutelino il nostro pianeta. Un impegno quotidiano per la creazione di un futuro sostenibile, contribuendo all’evoluzione del sistema sociale ed economico e tutelando, al tempo stesso, l’ecosistema e le generazioni future.

title: Stranded Technologies Podcast
description:
In this show, we talk about how to accelerate the future by unblocking so-called "stranded technologies" through network states, charter cities and crypto rails.

What are stranded technologies? Think of advanced drugs for longevity, tokenized assets, alternative education, clean low-cost energy or robo-fabrication of buildings.

These technologies exist already. But why don’t we use them yet at scale?

It’s not always for market-related reasons.

The thesis of this podcast is that the adoption of these technologies is often blocked by political obstacles, red tape and overregulation.

Yet the future could be now.

We could already be richer, live longer lives and let robots do more work for us - if we unblock these stranded technologies.

This podcast is not only about the practice of innovation, it is also about ethics: - How can we unblock vast opportunities, while mitigating against the risks?

- How can entrepreneurs overcome obstacles to work on frontiers, while responsible?

- What ethical rules and institutional regulations can guide us on that path? We will discuss these and other questions with entrepreneurs, regulators and industry experts.

Join the community to discuss what’s said in the episodes: Discord: https://discord.gg/Z4H6UjbubK Website: https://www.infinitafund.com/

title: The Digital Diplomat Podcast - Impact Locally, Build Globally
description:
Welcome to The Digital Diplomat Podcast where you learn how to impact locally and build globally. 

If you’re on a mission to solve local and global problems affecting your life and the lives of your loved ones. If you’re tired of dealing with the same issues plastered across news channels on  your television screen and are ready to take action. If you know your life is bigger than the box you or someone else has put you in, then this podcast is for you.

Across all industries, digitalization is offering unprecedented opportunities for innovation as well as challenges. From the workplace to government, business as usual is rapidly evolving and so should the people, policies, and processes that affect each and every one of us.

Join W.E. Da’Cruz, an  Award-Winning Tech and Food Entrepreneur and highly sought International Consultant on Digitalization and Digital Trade, while she interviews global leaders, organizers, business owners and so much more on topics including technology, digital divide, international trade, job creation, capacity building, eradicating poverty and more.

As a Ghanaian-American mother of three, wife, business partner and more, you’ll hear her personal stories and honest experiences woven into conversations with her guests to learn how you can become an active  participant in solving local and global problems impacting economic development right where you are.

title: Fintech Podcast
description:
¡Bienvenidos a FINTECH PODCAST! El podcast de referencia para los entusiastas de la tecnología blockchain, inteligencia artificial, bitcoin, altcoins y finanzas. Únete a nosotros mientras exploramos el emocionante mundo de las criptomonedas y las innovaciones disruptivas que están transformando el panorama financiero.

Nuestro equipo de expertos analiza proyectos tecnológicos y blockchain, desglosando su funcionamiento y el impacto que podrían tener en diferentes sectores. Te mantendremos al tanto de las últimas noticias y tendencias en el mundo de las finanzas digitales, asegurándonos de que estés siempre al día con la información más relevante.

Con invitados especiales de renombre, entrevistaremos a los líderes y visionarios de la industria fintech, quienes compartirán sus conocimientos y perspectivas sobre las últimas innovaciones. Desde emprendedores hasta inversores y reguladores, exploraremos las voces que están dando forma al futuro de las finanzas.

Ya sea que seas un principiante curioso o un experto en la materia, FINTECH PODCAST es tu guía confiable para comprender los conceptos clave de la tecnología blockchain, la inteligencia artificial y las criptomonedas. Acompáñanos en este emocionante viaje mientras descubrimos cómo estas tecnologías están revolucionando el mundo financiero.

¡Suscríbete ahora a FINTECH PODCAST y mantente a la vanguardia de la evolución financiera!

description:

Season one features eight carefully curated guests coming from different backgrounds, cultures, languages and professions who all share the common goal of creating a more equal, more reasonable and increasingly sustainable future through their talent, network, vision and passion.

This is not your ordinary business podcast but a gentle platform for deeply meaningful conversations that redefines our views on doubt, failure and vulnerability and connects the blurring dots between smarter working habits and more balanced private life.

title: United Manufacturing Hub
description:
Here you can find the our "IT / OT fundamentals series" and audio versions of popular blog posts of the United Manufacturing Hub. 

Season 1 is about our blog posts. In our blog posts we write about the tools & technologies behind our Industrial IoT stack - from Unified Namespace to IT / OT infrastructure and security.

Season 2 is about our "IT / OT fundamentals series", which is based on our popular "Introduction to IT/OT" workshop, designed to provide a common ground for companies looking to enter the field of industrial IoT. It takes a step back and looks at the field from an architectural perspective, explaining key IT and OT concepts. As a final result, meaningful content discussions can now be held between IT and OT, and "bullshit bingo" is reduced.

The United Manufacturing Hub is an Open-Source Helm Chart for Kubernetes, which combines state-of-the-art IT / OT tools & technologies and brings them into the hands of the engineer. 

More information about the United Manufacturing Hub can be found here: https://learn.umh.app/

More information about our company UMH Systems GmbH can be found on our website: https://www.umh.app/

More information about the Unified Namespace can be found in the knowledge section of our learning platform: https://learn.umh.app/know/industrial-internet-of-things/techniques/unified-namespace/

title: Out on a Limb - Where Traditional Finance and the New Digital Economy Converge
description:
Tim Enneking gives high-level commentary on current events and other global macroeconomic factors that are shaping the fiat/crypto spaces and their growing inter-relationship. This podcast is designed for a broad range of audiences including those only beginning their journey into traditional finance and/or the digital asset space to those with an intermediate to professional understanding of global economics. Tim gives brief, thematic, and highly-focused updates and viewpoints in an easy-to-digest and time-efficient format. 

Mr. Enneking is the Chief Investment Officer of Mana Companies Asset Management, a nine-digit multi-generational family office and trust based in San Diego. Tim is also the founder and Principal of Digital Capital Management, LLC (“DCM”). DCM manages Crypto Asset Fund, which was awarded the "#1 hedge fund in 2021" in terms of absolute performance. He is also currently engaged as a Partner at three other crypto asset management companies, Psalion, BlockLabs and Hexis Management. Prior to founding DCM, Mr. Enneking was the founder and investment manager for the Crypto Currency Fund (“CCF”), one of the world’s first private funds focused on cryptocurrencies. Simultaneously, in 2013, he was engaged to manage the world’s first Bitcoin fund. He also has extensive international M&A experience, having completed more than 70 transactions with an aggregate transaction value of over US$12 billion. Tim is a retired Lieutenant Colonel and was a company commander during Desert Storm 1. He is Airborne, Ranger, and French Commando qualified. During his time in the military, he worked at embassies in London, Brussels, Moscow and Paris. Tim has five university degrees, all in international business and law. He speaks English, near-native Russian and French, and German.

title: Forced Nostalgia
description: Content Creation boomed in the 2010s and continues to flourish on the internet. Podcasts, YouTube, Twitch, personalized video websites, and so much more circulate in a massive over-inflation of content for the consumer. We have all tried to create something for the potential market, yet we only hear from the success stories: those who surpassed tens of thousands of loyal community members. What about the failures? The failed year-long attempt that only brought dozens of subs? What can the learnings of failed content creators do to benefit you? title: Marketing online: La gran burbuja del siglo XXI
description:
Nos maravillamos ante este descubrimiento del siglo XXI y todos nos volvimos locos poniendo anuncios en las redes sociales y en los buscadores de internet.
Todo parecía fácil, rápido y barato. 
Y nos lo creímos.
Entonces todo el mundo empezó a hablar de marketing online y muchos sin pasar por el offline.
¿Te imaginas que una mañana te despiertas y te das cuenta de que todo lo que sabes sobre marketing online es mentira?
Descubrirías con asombro que todo en lo que has trabajado durante tantos años y todo lo que has estudiado, se sostiene sobre pilares que no son ciertos o son incompletos. 
Autor: Javier Echaleku lanza este podcast con motivo de su 30 aniversario profesional en el mundo de las empresas, del marketing y de la publicidad. 
El resumen de sus aprendizajes e investigaciones de toda una vida.

title: Web 3 Artist Spotlight
description:
This is a weekly podcast where I interview and highlight the amazing work of web 3 artists (i.e., artists that create and sell their artwork on blockchains such as Ethereum, Polygon and Tezos). The purpose of the podcast is to enable people to discover and/or learn more about web 3 artists, their journey, art, process and inspiration. In doing so, artists may expand their audiences and listeners may feel inspired to start creating and minting art of their own. Every episode is recorded via a live Twitter Space where attendees have an opportunity to ask the guest artist questions. This is a very inclusive space welcoming artists of all nationalities, backgrounds and artistic styles. Whether they have a huge following or are just starting their career, all are welcome. The show celebrates how art and creativity can bring us all together.

Welcome to A Digital Health Story! I'm Nelo, a tech-savvy clinician and healthcare professional with a passion for digital health. On this channel, I'll be sharing my insights and experiences as I explore the amazing world of technology and its role in healthcare.

From the basics of digital health to the latest trends and predictions, I'll be covering a wide range of topics that I hope will inspire and educate you. Whether you are a healthcare professional looking to learn more about digital health, or just someone who is interested in staying up-to-date on the latest tech trends, I hope you'll find value in the content I share on this channel.

So join me on this journey and let's explore the exciting world of digital health together! Don't forget to like, share, and subscribe to stay up-to-date on all the amazing content coming your way.

title: Checkpoint Radio: A Video Game Podcast
description:
Checkpoint Radio is a fan run, video game podcast, where we give opinions and analysis of games, gaming news and much more. We've all been gaming for over two decades, starting out on iconic consoles such as the Mega Drive and the N64, to PCs and everything in between.

As dedicated, passionate fans we want to build a community of like-minded, thoughtful gamers who love to talk about games as much as we do and appreciate gaming in the same way.

The aim for Checkpoint Radio is to dig deeper into the games, and explore our emotional connection with this incredible art form, as well as celebrating the achievements and talents from the industry, all through the lens of four, passionate gamers!

To join our Discord, follow us on socials, YouTube and much more, click here:

https://linktr.ee/checkpointradio

Checkpoint Radio is hosted by Ben, Charlie, Connor and James.

title: Darknet Demystified
description:
Welcome to Darknet Demystified, a podcast hosted by Sam Bent, an ex-darknet vendor and market admin, author, paralegal, DefCon speaker, nerd, pirate, and agorist. With over a decade of experience in the darknet under various aliases such as DoingFedTime, 12189082 (BOP ID), 2happytimes2, Killab, and many others, Sam brings a wealth of knowledge and insight to the world of hacking, cybersecurity, exploits, and the darknet subculture.

In this podcast, Sam will delve into the latest developments and trends in the darknet, provide expert analysis on the current state of the darkweb and its evolution. He will also share his experiences as a darknet vendor and market admin, giving listeners an inside look into the workings of the darknet, its culture and the people who inhabit it.

Sam will also address the legal and ethical considerations of the darknet, as well as the importance of understanding the laws and regulations in your country before using the darknet or any anonymity tool. He will also provide tips and tricks for staying safe and secure while navigating the darknet, as well as discuss the latest news and developments in the world of hacking and cybersecurity.

In addition to the podcast, Sam runs the youtube channels Doingfedtime, all hacking cons, and 2happytimes2, where he shares information and tutorials on hacking, cybersecurity, and the darknet.

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced hacker, Darknet Demystified is the perfect podcast for anyone looking to gain a deeper understanding of the darknet, stay informed on the latest developments, and learn how to stay safe and secure while navigating the digital world. Available on all major podcast platforms, Tune in to Darknet Demystified where the darknet is demystified and the truth is uncovered. With Sam Bent's expert analysis and in-depth understanding of the darknet, you'll gain valuable insights and knowledge to help you navigate the complex and ever-changing world of the darkweb.

title: Antares Vision Group - Italian
description: Antares Vision Group è partner tecnologico d’eccellenza nella digitalizzazione e nell’innovazione per imprese, istituzioni e autorità governative, garantisce sicurezza, qualità, sostenibilità e efficienza di prodotti e filiere generando fiducia. Offre un ecosistema integrato di tecnologie – sia software, sia hardware - per garantire la qualità dei prodotti (sistemi e macchine di ispezione) e la tracciabilità dei prodotti lungo la filiera (dalle materie prime, alla produzione, dalla distribuzione fino al consumatore), con una gestione integrata di dati, di produzione e di filiera, anche tramite l’applicazione dell’intelligenza artificiale e l'utilizzo di blockchain. Antares Vision Group è attivo nel settore Life Science (farmaceutico, dispositivi biomedicali e ospedali), nel Beverage, Food, Cosmetico, Chimico e nel Packaging e potenzialmente in molte altre industrie. Leader mondiale per la tracciabilità dei farmaci, fornisce i principali produttori mondiali (oltre il 50% delle top 20 multinazionali) e diverse autorità governative, di soluzioni per monitorare la filiera e validare l'autenticità dei prodotti. Società quotata da aprile 2019 su AIM Italia e dal 14 maggio 2021 su Euronext - segmento STAR, Antares Vision Group ha raggiunto un volume d'affari nel 2021 per €179 milioni, è presente in più di 60 Paesi, impiega oltre 1100 dipendenti e consolida una rete di oltre 40 Partners internazionali. Ulteriori informazioni sono reperibili sul sito www.antaresvision.com e su www.antaresvisiongroup.com.

title: Antares Vision Group - English
description:
Antares Vision Group is technology partner in digitalization and innovation for companies, institutions and governments, guaranteeing safety and quality, sustainability and efficiency of products and supply chains to build trust.
 It provides a unique and integrated ecosystem of technologies – including software and hardware – to guarantee product quality (inspection systems and equipment) and end-to-end traceability (from raw materials to production, from distribution to the consumer), through connected data management, applying artificial intelligence and blockchain .
AV Group is active in the Life Science  (pharmaceuticals, medical devices, and hospitals), Beverage, Food, Cosmetics, Chemicals and Packaging  and potentially in many other industries. The world leader in track and trace solutions for pharmaceutical products, it provides major global pharma manufacturers (more than 50% of the Top 20 multinationals) and several government authorities with solutions to monitor their supply chains and validate product authenticity.
Listed since April 2019 on the Italian Stock Exchange in the Alternative Investment Market (AIM) segment and from 14 May 2021 in the STAR segment of the Mercato Telematico Azionario (MTA) (electronic equity market), AV Group recorded a turnover of Euro 179 million in 2021, operates in more than 60 countries, employs more than 1,100 people, and has a consolidated network of more than 40 international partners. For more information, visit antaresvision.com and antaresvisiongroup.com.

title: CHATTING WITH CHATBOTS
description: Testing the limits of artificial intelligence by chatting to the artificially intelligent. It's an entirely new sort of podcast. An artificial presenter talks to artificial chatbots. Why? In order to establish the boundary that separates human from machine intelligence. It's funny. It's thought provoking. It dramatises what chatbots can and cannot do. It's a revelation! The sudden popularity of artificial intelligence programs has created a massive use of Chatbots to do all sorts of tasks from writing school and university essays to generating computer code. It’s said that in America a chatbot has passed the American bar exam. (Bear in mind, that may just be a rumour put about by chatbots. Which in itself may be even more alarming if they’re starting to manage their own reputations.) In any event, white collar professionals believe their jobs are about to be taken over by machines. This podcast may be reassuring in one way. Because we see that chatbots can make complete idiots of themselves. But it's also true that . . . THEY'RE COMING! Don’t believe me? Don’t want to believe me? Can’t believe they’re really that good? Let's talk to them and find out!

title: Innovation at the Edge
description:
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in video technology, by tuning in to MainStreaming's "Innovation at the Edge" podcast.

MainStreaming was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Milan. It is an intelligent media delivery company that has grown to become a leading company, bringing solutions to the challenges of VOD and live video streaming at scale. MainStreaming is at the forefront of the Edge Computing market due to its expertise in the streaming industry. It provides broadcast-grade live streaming at scale through its AI-powered Video Edge Network to D2C business leaders, content owners, enterprises, telcos, broadcasters, and streamers. To address the increasing demand for high-quality video streaming, MainStreaming has developed its proprietary Video Edge Network that enables seamless live video streaming at scale while ensuring a high quality of experience for millions of concurrent viewers, ultra-low latency, business ROI, and environmental sustainability.

MainStreaming's Edge CDN, orchestrated upon three pillars: Smart Architecture, Intelligent Software, and Edge Distribution Network, has contributed to the success of our customers in the video technology.

Take your first steps towards your success and stay ahead of the curve with us.

Stick around, as there's more to come!

title: AI: Artificial Imagination
description: What does AI dream about? We fuelled AI's imagination with single, randomly-selected words, plus a short descriptive phrase. It then created a series of dreams, which include finding a love from a previous life, commemorative rituals, chess playing dogs, a shape-shifting orchestra and more. The scenarios - and their AI-generated interpretations - are a mix of surreal, comedic, and scary. AI: Artificial Imagination is written and performed by AI, and produced by humans.

title: Unleashing Tech Innovation with Biometric Talent
description:
Unleashing Tech Innovation with Biometric Talent: Empowering Technology Leaders and Fuelling Technological Breakthroughs

Welcome to "Unleashing Tech Innovation with Biometric Talent," an inspiring podcast series hosted by Ben Malloy. Join us on a journey that delves deep into the world of technology, as we explore groundbreaking innovations, insightful leadership strategies, and the latest developments shaping the tech industry.

In each episode, Ben engages in insightful conversations with renowned technology professionals and visionary leaders who are driving change and pushing boundaries in their respective domains. Through these captivating interviews, we uncover their unique perspectives, strategic approaches, and real-world experiences, offering listeners invaluable insights into the ever-evolving tech landscape.

"Unleashing Tech Innovation with Biometric Talent" is your backstage pass to the minds of tech pioneers, illuminating the path to innovation. From disruptive startups to established industry giants, we bring you the stories of those who are reshaping the future of technology. Discover how these trailblazers navigate challenges, harness emerging technologies, and inspire transformative ideas to revolutionize their organizations and industries.

Whether you're an aspiring tech professional, a seasoned leader, or an astute business visionary, this podcast series offers a wealth of inspiration and knowledge to help you stay ahead of the curve.

Powered by Biometric Talent, a leading tech recruitment business specializing in identifying and nurturing top talent, this podcast series is more than just conversations—it's a catalyst for personal and professional growth. By uncovering the secrets of tech innovation and exploring the ever-evolving tech landscape, we empower you to fuel your own success and become a catalyst for change.

Biometric Talent - Empowering Technology Leaders, Fueling Technological Breakthroughs.

title: Bits of New York
description:
Welcome to our Bits of New York Podcast, where we deep dive into the world of Bitcoin and discuss the latest happenings and opportunities this new technology brings to New York State.

Like any new technology, there is always a learning curve. We aim to assist you and introduce you to people who believe in this new tech. We'll interview experts, entrepreneurs, educators, and industry insiders to share their insights and perspectives on the rapidly evolving world of Bitcoin. In this podcast, we'll cover everything from basic knowledge and regulations to innovative startups and help you stay informed and updated on the latest Bitcoin happenings in New York.

So, whether you're a long-time Bitcoin enthusiast or just getting started, sit back, relax, and join us for an exciting journey into the world of Bitcoin in New York.

Who are we? We are your hosts Kelly and Matt Lewis. We ran a successful small business in New York State for 15 years and love hearing the stories of fellow entrepreneurs.

title: A Bird's Eye View
description:
Welcome to "A Bird's Eye View," a podcast hosted by Raven Health's very own Tim Crilly, a Board Certified Behavior Analyst (BCBA). Join Tim as he shares his unique perspective on the world of applied behavior analysis and its impact on the lives of those it serves.

Through insightful conversations with fellow BCBAs and other experts in the field, Tim delves into topics such as the latest research, best practices, and the challenges and rewards of working with clients across the spectrum. Tim also shares personal stories and experiences from his own practice, providing listeners with a glimpse into the day-to-day life of a BCBA.

Whether you're a seasoned BCBA or just starting out in the field, "A Bird's Eye View" offers valuable insights and practical advice that you can apply to your own practice. With a focus on innovation and cutting-edge technology, Tim and his guests explore the latest tools and techniques that can help you deliver the best possible outcomes for your clients.

So, join us for "A Bird's Eye View" and discover how applied behavior analysis is making a difference in the lives of individuals with autism and other developmental disabilities. Subscribe now to never miss an episode!

description:
Yet Another Science Podcast (YASP) is a podcast devoted to conversations with scholars containing philosophical, historical, motivational, conceptual, and technical questions relating to their research.

The goal of the podcast is two-fold: first, to provide an informal medium for researchers to discuss and philosophize about their work. Second, a medium for curious minds of various levels (motivated high school students to professors) to learn about your work from the first-person source.

description: Come aboard as we challenge the status quo and explore the future of learning with thought leaders from across the globe, and ask one of life's most important questions: WHY? title: Entresophy - Ramblings on Entrepreneurship and Philosophy
description:
Episode edited and transcription generated with www.koolio.ai

Join us on our podcasts as we dive into the fascinating world of "Entresophy" [entirely our term!] - the intersection of entrepreneurship and philosophy. Drawing from our personal experiences in the tech industry and our upbringing in Sanatana Dharma philosophy and spirituality, we explore how these two fields can enrich and inform each other. We discuss the importance of self-reflection, risk-taking, and ethical considerations in entrepreneurship, and how incorporating spiritual teachings can offer a unique perspective on finding balance and harmony in our actions. From navigating the constantly evolving landscape of technology to finding purpose beyond just financial success, we delve into the big questions and share our insights on how Entresophy can help shape us as individuals and society.

title: The Cure Chronicles
description:
Imagine a world without HIV. At Addimmune, we see that world as a very real possibility. We’re pursuing a potential cure for HIV using gene therapy, and we believe we could see the end of HIV in our lifetimes.

For people living with HIV, a cure would mean no more lifelong antiretroviral therapy, no fear of AIDS, and no possibility of being contagious.

On “The Cure Chronicles” Podcast, we take a deep look into the lives of extraordinary individuals – authors, comedians, doctors, community leaders, educators, advocates, and more – many with their own diagnoses, who are all striving toward the common goal of ending HIV.

‎

About Addimmune:

Addimmune is a clinical-stage, gene therapy company in Rockville, Maryland. Our mission is to harness the power of gene therapy to create a world without HIV.

title: Cyber Trooper
description:
Hello There!

Welcome to the Cyber Trooper! I am Durga Srikari, and I am a cyber security professional. I have worked in the field of cybersecurity for 6 years. Currently, I work as a cyber security researcher while also pursuing my master’s in information science.

With the increase in demand for cyber security professionals, there is an information overload about the profession and the requirements needed to enter the field.

In this podcast, we will talk to experts from various departments in cyber security to learn about cybersecurity practices implemented across organizations. We will find out about their journey and discuss the opportunities present for students and cyber security aspirants who wish to join the field. We will find out from them the skill set required to join different cybersecurity roles.

This podcast will help you learn about different departments in cyber security and help you identify your best fit in the field. I hope you find our episodes helpful, and please feel free to share your suggestions so that we can improve the show.

title: Mastering Cloud and DevOps: Learn by listening with Live Projects solutions
description:
Let you understand the following on this prodcast series:

  1. Purpose: The purpose of this podcast is to help listeners master cloud and DevOps skills through live project solutions. By presenting real-life scenarios and providing step-by-step instructions, listeners can gain practical experience in working with different cloud and DevOps tools and technologies.

  2. Benefits: There are several benefits of this podcast, including:

  • Practical learning: The live project solutions presented in the podcast provide listeners with hands-on experience, allowing them to apply the concepts and techniques they learn in a real-world context.

  • Skill development: By working on live projects, listeners can develop their cloud and DevOps skills and gain experience with different tools and technologies.

  • Problem-solving: The live projects presented in the podcast challenge listeners to think creatively and solve problems, helping to build their problem-solving skills.

  • Career advancement: By mastering cloud and DevOps skills through live projects, listeners can enhance their resumes and advance their careers in cloud computing and DevOps.

  • Accessible learning: The podcast format makes cloud and DevOps learning accessible to a wide audience, allowing listeners to learn at their own pace and on their own schedule.

  • Expert guidance: The podcast is hosted by an expert in cloud computing and DevOps, providing listeners with valuable insights and guidance.

Overall, this podcast provides a unique and engaging way for listeners to learn and develop their cloud and DevOps skills through live project solutions.

title: /root - O Podstech da Celcoin
description:
A Celcoin acaba de lançar a primeira temporada do /root, que reúne especialistas de renome do mercado. O programa tem o objetivo de debater sobre o caminho percorrido pela tecnologia até chegar nas soluções hoje protagonistas, além das principais tendências para um futuro de constantes transformações.

Alguns dos temas discutidos nessa primeira temporada são a “Fintechzação” da indústria e do varejo, o desenvolvimento do Open Finance, a cultura de produtos e marcas, a evolução da Internet das Coisas e da Inteligência Artificial, entre outros.

O podcast conta com ilustres convidados para a realização desses debates. Nomes como Danylo Martins (fundador e publisher do Finsiders), Marcell Almeida (CEO & cofundador dos cursos PM3), Guga Stocco (cofundador da Futurum Capital e membro do board da Totvs) e Alexandre Uehara (embaixador da Singularity University, fundador e head de inovação da Innov8) serão algumas das referências recebidas pela Celcoin no /root.

O CMO e co-fundador da Celcoin, Adriano Meirinho, ressalta a proposta do /root de abordar a evolução e as novas soluções tecnológicas a partir de pessoas que vivenciaram todo o processo até o atual momento:

“Reunimos um time de especialistas para nos apoiar na missão de resgatar os primórdios da internet e, no decorrer dessa jornada, explicar um pouco mais sobre os assuntos nos quais a Celcoin atua como Open Finance, inovação e cyber security, e que nem sempre são conhecidos ou compreendidos por todos.”

Como uma pioneira em oferecer infraestrutura de tecnologia financeira e bancária, a Celcoin é obstinada pela inovação e atualmente impacta mais de 3 mil empresas e 15 milhões de clientes finais, movimentando R$ 6 bilhões por mês. Sua jornada no mercado a transformou em uma infratech financeira para potencializar negócios de indústrias dos mais diversos segmentos, conectando cada uma delas às oportunidades do mercado e sempre desenvolvendo soluções incorporadas às necessidades de seus clientes.

É em meio a esse cenário que surgiu o /root, pronto para compartilhar mais dessa experiência da Celcoin adquirida ao longo de sua jornada, trazendo grandes contribuições sobre inovação, soluções, tecnologia e evolução, e proporcionando trocas de conhecimento extremamente relevantes junto de outras referências nesses assuntos.

Mais informações? :) marketing@celcoin.com.br
