title: Last Week in IT
description:
Last Week in IT is a weekly podcast, short enough to be listen during the daily grocery visit.

What is new, exciting in IT world? What happened recently? Let's talk and share our unique view on the most interesting topics in the industry. But we do not explain tools, languages or technologies. Our voice is different.

Together with Jakub Siwiecki and Jan Mazurek, my fantastic co-hosts we welcome you here and we hope you will enjoy our show!

We present our own view and opinions, based on our own experience and knowledge.

title: Daniel Aharonoff Presents
description: Daniel Aharonoff talks about trending topics in the exponential age.

title: Lutz & Jasper powered by Cherry Ventures
description: Breaking down the latest developments in AI with two experts — Jasper Masemann, investment partner at Cherry Ventures, and Lutz Finger, a visiting senior lecturer at Cornell University's SC Johnson College of Business and President of Product and Development at Marpai, Inc.

title: !?של מי הקוד הזה
description: אנחנו מרכז החדשנות של נטאפ בענן, ובכל פרק נדבר על הכשלונות וההצלחות שהובילו את העובדים שלנו למסקנות שכולנו נוכל ללמוד מהן

title: WTFED
description: Подкаст про Front-End розробку у Wix.com та за його межами.

title: Energiamajanduse telgitagustes
description: Podcast „Energiamajanduse telgitagustes“ viib kuulaja energiateemade juurde. See on valdkond, kus on toimumas meeletult arenguid ning mis täna ei jäta külmaks kedagi ja puudutab väga otseselt meid kõiki. Soovime hoida kätt energiamajanduse pulsil ning anda põhjaliku ja arusaadava ülevaate valdkonnas toimuvast. Sama oluline on eesmärk anda panus valdkonna diskussiooni edasiviimiseks ja heade ideede esiletõusuks. Podcasti toob kuulajateni ABB, saatejuht on Sven Sommer.

title: Upstream Podcast
description: The Upstream podcast is a companion podcast to Upstream, the annual Tidelift event celebrating open source, the developers who use it and the maintainers who make it. Host Luis Villa, Tidelift co-founder and General Counsel, is joined by individuals from all corners of the open source universe, and together they’ll offer unique perspectives, concerns, and solutions on the state of open source as we know it (and predict it to be!). Episodes are released weekly on Wednesdays, with a few new seasons each year. You can find Luis on Twitter: @luis_in_brief, and luis@tidelift, and follow Tidelift (@tidelift) and Upstream (@upstreamOSS). Get in touch with questions, comments, or topic suggestions at info@tidelift.com.

title: Gaming_for_insight
description:
Gaming_for_insight provides the following content: weekly gaming updates; its monthly show, Last Month In Gaming; and, segments on gaming handhelds (e.g., ASUS ROG Ally) including the segment Which Handheld Plays It Better.

Weekly gaming updates are brief and cover up to five significant updates that occurred the week prior. Monthly episodes of Last Month In Gaming include Joe, the Panel, and perhaps a special guest that team up to show you what games released the month prior.

Handheld content extend to hardware installs and software adjustments. The segment Which Handheld Plays It Better covers a game (e.g., Skyrim) played across two to three handhelds using certain settings (e.g., APU TDB, Texture settings, VRAM Allocation, FSR).

The channel name, Gaming_for_insight, was inspired by the game, Bloodborne. One plays the game to gain insight and as the player gains insight he or she discovers more about Yharnam just your host Joe gains insight with gaming.

title: Platform Alchemy - Turning Cloud into Gold
description:
Cloud engineering and all the tools that go with it.

Platform Alchemy is a podcast about DevOps, Cloud Engineering, SRE and all the things us Infra people get up to.

https://platformalchemy.com coming soon!

title: TheOGNerds Podcast
description: We are the OG 3 and we talk about video game, movies and more!

title: House Of Wolves Podcast
description: Average Gamers with an opinion on everything. New episodes every Wednesday!

title: IACIS Podcast
description: Farand C. Wasiak hosts the official International Association of Computer Investigative Specialists (IACIS) Podcast. This podcast will be a nexus of subject matter expert interviews, training class previews, and much more; all related to the field of computer forensics and analysis.

title: Android iOs & AI Unleashed - Exploring Cutting-Edge AI Trends in the Mobile World (English & French)
description:
1. Dive into the latest Android & iOs & AI trends and innovations shaping the mobile landscape.

  2. Stay up-to-date with the newest Android OS features, UI enhancements, and app developments.

  3. In-depth analysis and discussions on groundbreaking Android-powered devices and their impact on the market.

  4. Exclusive interviews with industry experts, developers, and influencers in the Android community.

  5. Weekly app spotlights, highlighting the most exciting and useful apps making waves in the Android ecosystem.

  6. Tips, tricks, and hacks for optimizing your Android experience and getting the most out of your device.

  7. Listener Q&A segments, where we address your burning questions and offer personalized advice for all things Android.

  8. Security and privacy news, ensuring you're informed about the latest threats and vulnerabilities affecting Android users.

  9. A glimpse into the future of Android, exploring emerging technologies and their potential applications in the mobile world.

  10. Engaging conversations, expert insights, and your one-stop destination for everything Android.

  11. Multilingual

title: ICA SERIES
description: Podcast "EXPLICATE" de los organizadores de competiciones de Apex Legends y Overwatch a nivel online y presencial. Próximamente mas!

title: Sewer Signals
description: Welcome to Sewer Signals, a podcast highlighting utility experiences with wastewater surveillance. Here, you’ll find interviews with water professionals involved in wastewater surveillance programs from a range of utility sizes in a wide variety of settings across the US. We’ll aim to cover more or less the same topics in each interview, including how their wastewater surveillance programs got started and how they are set up, how the data are being used, and lessons learned along the way. Please email us if you’d like to be featured on the podcast.
author_name: Anna Mehrotra from the Water Environment Federation

title: Hard Tech Podcast
description: Showcasing new Hardware Tech and the Innovators behind them. Covering Robotics, Energy, Healthcare, and more.

title: Internet es para todos
description: El internet es una nueva tecnología que ha llegado para quedarse en nuestras vidas, y con ello, trae múltiples ventajas, pero esto es si sabemos como ocuparla correctamente, y sin perder de vista los riesgos que conlleva utilizarla.
author_name: Naidelin Kiabeth Melo González, Andre Zuriel López Santiago, Iker Misraim Hernandez López

title: Unbundling Embedded Finance
description:
Curious about how technology is changing the financial world? Interested in the latest trends in embedded finance and the opportunities it offers businesses and customers alike? Then our new podcast series is for you.

It's all about the rapidly changing financial services industry. Whether you're a seasoned professional or just eager to learn more about the world of embedded finance, our podcast offers exciting insights and expert analysis.

Let our host Elliot and our experts from Solaris demystify the world of financial services for you. Don't miss this exciting and informative new series - listen now and stay ahead of the curve in the world of finance!

title: Running a Small Building Firm
description: ‘Running a small building firm’ is brought to you by the HBXL Group, construction software and estimating experts in the UK. The podcast is for owners, partners, managers and estimators at residential building firms. We welcome businesses building extensions, renovations, loft conversions and new builds. We discuss everything from money and marketing, to competitors and contracts. We share advice and best practice.

title: MVP Engineer
description: Minimum Viable Product discussion, lean startups, architecting software and staying essentialist.

title: Deep Dives 🤿
description:
The best designers never stop learning 💪

This interview series is designed to unlock knowledge from today's most prolific designers so that you can learn from their journey and take a leap forward in your own career.

Now you can learn directly from designers like 👇

✦ Joey Banks (Design systems @ Webflow/Twitter)

✦ Femke (Design lead @ Gusto)

✦ Fonz Morris (Design lead for monetization @ Netflix)

✦ Mia Blume (Early design leader @ Square/Pinterest)

✦ Jorn van Dijk (CEO @ Framer)

✦ Charli Prangley (Creative director @ ConvertKit)

✦ Bonnie Kate Wolf (Creator of the Netflix icon library)

✦ Dan Hollick (Framer expert)

✦ Steph Engle (AR design at Snap)

Welcome to the deep end of design education 👉 Dive.club

title: Rock Paper Bitcoin
description: ₿usiness Cat and Fundamentals are two plebs from Pennsylvania who talk about their lives, bitcoin, and finding signal in a noisy world

title: Mechaman Maandoverzicht
description: Mechaman weet alles over techniek in de landbouw en groensector. In het Mechaman Maandoverzicht wordt het belangrijkste mechanisatienieuws van afgelopen maand voor je op een rijtje gezet.

title: Grasmannen
description: Grasmannen is een zesdelige podcastserie waarin Chris Vlaanderen, redacteur van Tuin en Park Techniek, in gesprek gaat met de personen die de belangrijkste grasmatten van Nederland onderhouden. In de podcastserie ontdek je hoe en met welke machines en techniek de voetbalvelden groen, kort en bovendien onkruid- en ziektevrij worden gehouden.

title: CISO Talks
description: CISO Talks is a weekly show which is tailored for CISOs and I.T. professionals but can also appeal to anyone with an interest in cybersecurity. We discuss a number of topics regarding the CISO and I.T. professional role and how certain scenarios, changes and trends are shaping the role(s) as well as the cybersecurity industry. If you are a CISO or an I.T. professional or if you just have an interesting topic to discuss on our show then please send our producer of the show, Dan, an email. daniel.curme@lepide.com Watch/listen on your favourite platforms: https://linktr.ee/cisotalks Copyright ©️ 2023 Lepide. All Rights Reserved.

title: SIM-PAC LIVE
description:
Hosted by Geoff Matthews, SIM-PAC Live is the broadcast show of Sustainable Industrial Manufacturing - Asia Pacific. The show features interviews with the people whose technology and thinking are driving change and delivering a sustainable future for industrial manufacturing. With an acute focus on what is deployable today and tomorrow, SIM-PAC Live will also showcase emerging technologies that need to be fast-tracked.

SIM-PAC Live

www.sustainableindustrialmanufacturing.com/sim-pac

title: The Chameleons Podcast
description:
The world as we know is changing fast. We are experiencing a technological shift with an enormous potential for advances in knowledge and solutions for individuals and society. This requires extraordinary human agency and ability to adjust to the changes and navigate this unknown territory together. This is why this podcast is called The Chameleons – as a tribute to our incredibly malleable nature.

Host Imac Zambrana is seeking input from a group of international and Norwegian experts and advocates from tech-relevant fields concerning their thoughts about the potential of different interplays between technology, individuals, and societies. These conversations about real and fictional meetings between human and machine in the past, present, and future, are an invitation to reflect on how we can adjust for what might, what will, and what might never come.

Language: English & Norwegian (depending on the native language of the guests).

Music by: Håkon Onsager.

Graphics by: Øivin Horvei.

Guest Relationship Advisor: Nicole Patrice De Member

title: Scanning the Industry with Jamye Carpenter
description: Scanning the Industry is an automotive podcast presented by UVeye where Jamye Carpenter brings on guests from the automotive industry and talks about trending topics in the world of automotive.

title: The Marketing Manifesto
description: The Marketing Manifesto is brought to you by Virtual Pebbles. Listen as a leading figure in the Digital Transformation world answers popular questions asked by you!

title: The Builder Circle by Pratik: The Hardware Product Development and Startup Podcast
description:
The Builder Circle podcast is for hardware entrepreneurs and builders who are in the process of physical product development and would benefit from getting actionable advice and expert insight around the entire value chain of hardware development. Think of it as a curriculum for anyone wanting to build a hardware product!

The host, Sera Evcimen is the Founder of Pratik, a hardware advising and coaching company, passionate about helping builders plan ahead, reduce technical risk and build their hardware venture successfully. The episodes feature digestible and practical conversations with hardware engineers, hardware entrepreneurs, venture-creation specialists and hardware investors. Every episode ends with a TL;DL (too long didn't listen) to summarize key takeaways and aid in establishing your next steps in your hardware venture. If this sounds like you, welcome to The Builder Circle, I am so glad you are here and I hope that the podcast acts as a strategic partner as you continue your product development journey!

title: David talks with...
description: Welcome to conversations with David concerning intelligence, science, technology, ethics, society, religion, and beyond.

title: From Scratch
description: Hi everyone! Welcome to From Scratch: A podcast that explores the world of STEM and start-ups, hosted by Esha Shenoy.

title: LandbouwMechanisatie Zomertour
description: Elk jaar gaat LandbouwMechanisatie op Zomertour. Tijdens deze roadtrip verzamelen redacteuren Jasper Lentz en Chris Vlaanderen interessante verhalen voor vakblad LandbouwMechanisatie. Luister mee met de avonturen van Jasper en Chris.

title: In productie
description: In de podcastserie 'In productie' volgt LandbouwMechanisatie verschillende Nederlandse bedrijven die bijzondere machines bouwen of aanpassen. In het eerste seizoen hoor je het productieproces van de MultiToolTrac, een diesel-elektrische trekker met verstelbare spoorbreedte. In het tweede seizoen ontdek je hoe de onderzoekers van Wageningen University and Research een aardappelrooier aanpassen voor de rijpadenteelt.

title: Databoeren
description: Databoeren is een vierdelige podcastserie en wordt geproduceerd door Mechaman in samenwerking met stichting Boer&Data. In deze serie hoor je boeren die al langere tijd data verzamelen en gebruiken. Wat kun je met de data? Waar sla je het op? En wat levert het op?

title: Nano, ¿Qué? Podcast
description: Somos 3 estudiantes de Nano entusiasmados por compartir lo que sabemos de ciencia con ustedes

title: Netabide Podcast
description:
The Netabide Podcast: Unleashing the secrets to thriving in the digital age.

The goal is to build you to last. In our world where the internet is becoming increasingly central to our lives, It's more important than ever to understand how to use the internet in a way that enhances our dreams and help us achieve our goals.

The podcast space is intended to reach out to friends and professionals and share with them all the opportunities around by just abiding by the net and the essence of creating their own unique identity. We'll hear from experts in the field and share practical tips and strategy for becoming a member of the online community.

title: Celular 50 – A Próxima Geração
description:
A marca dos 50 anos desde a primeira ligação, nos leva, não somente em uma viagem através do tempo, como estabelece reflexões sobre as consequências geradas com o desenvolvimento do dispositivo na sociedade atual e para as próximas gerações.

Sabendo disso, o Podcast Celular 50 traz uma sequência de entrevistas com personalidades de diversas áreas a fim de desvendar a importância e as implicações do celular para o futuro da sociedade.

Visite a Exposição Celular 50! De maio a agosto de 2023, no Museu do Amanhã.

Mais informações e ingressos à venda em www.celular50.com.br.

title: MundoBNB
description:
¡Bienvenido a nuestro podcast de renta vacacional! Sumérgete en el fascinante mundo de la industria de la renta vacacional mientras entrevistamos a destacados profesionales en el campo. Desde administradores de propiedades y propietarios hasta empresas especializadas en renta vacacional, exploraremos todos los aspectos de esta industria en constante evolución.

Además, no nos limitaremos solo a los profesionales directamente relacionados con la renta vacacional. También conversaremos con proveedores clave como corredores de bienes raíces, diseñadores, arquitectos, desarrolladores y muchos más, para obtener una visión completa de la industria.

Nuestro enfoque es educativo. A través de las experiencias y el conocimiento compartidos por nuestros invitados, aprenderás valiosas lecciones y consejos en cada episodio. Sin embargo, no nos conformamos con ser solo informativos: nuestras conversaciones serán amenas y en un tono de charla, evitando las entrevistas formales y frías.

Únete a nosotros en este viaje emocionante mientras descubrimos los secretos del éxito en la industria de la renta vacacional y nos sumergimos en historias fascinantes y perspectivas únicas de los profesionales que la conforman. ¡Prepárate para ser inspirado y motivado en cada episodio de nuestro podcast!

title: The B Word
description: Welcome to 'The B word', the show where we demystify everything to do with B2B branding, to get to what it really is, how it works and why it matters for businesses. Join us as we cut through the complexity and get to the most important Bs, the business benefits!

title: GaraBot
description:
Un espacio para enterarnos qué innovaciones aplican los empresarios en Ecuador y en el mundo. Qué están haciendo, en qué están invirtiendo. Los conductores de GaraBot son Garita, una voz creada con Inteligencia Artificial y Giovanny Astudillo, un cuencano.

Una producción de Grupo EL COMERCIO. Edición de Oscar Álvarez.

Puedes contactarnos en ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠podcast@elcomercio.com ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠

Gracias por escuchar este podcast.

Más info: https://www.elcomercio.com/podcasts/garabot

title: Logically Speaking
description:
Are you looking for a reliable source of information on cybersecurity and future-ready solutions?

Logically Speaking - the speaker series from Logically - has got you covered.

Hosted by Logically’s Chief Revenue Officer, Steven Rivera, each episode of Logically Speaking will bring industry experts to cover a variety of topics such as ransomware trends, data breach prevention protocols, cloud services security, and much more. Our aim is to provide you with the tools and knowledge you need to keep your organization secure and future-ready.

Whether you’re a cybersecurity professional or simply interested in learning more about cybersecurity and the growing complexity in technology, Logically Speaking is the perfect source of information for you.

title: Ingaged
description: We know tech is changing the way people market and sell more than ever and on this show, we sit down with sales and marketing thought leaders and experts to learn how you can create, share and measure your way to success.

title: QuébGPT - Podcast
description: Découvrez le QuébGPT Podcast : une plateforme où les expert.e.s en IA partagent comment cette technologie transforme nos vies et nos entreprises. Destiné aux dirigeant.e.s et entrepreneuses, nous discutons d'exemples concrets d'implantation d'IA, montrant comment profiter de ces innovations dès aujourd'hui. Rejoignez-nous pour explorer l'avenir de l'IA et son potentiel pour votre entreprise.

title: devslove.it - der Podcast
description:
Ein Podcast von Frontend-Enthusiasten für Frontend-Enthusiasten - gemeinsam führen Alex Bürner und Dominik Laube, beide Web-Frontend-Entwickler seit mehr als einem Jahrzehnt, durch dieses Format. Das gewisse Thema gibt es nicht, nur einen Rahmen: Web-Entwicklung. Ob fachliche oder rein persönliche Themen, sehr detaillierte oder einfache Beschreibungen - mit einem gewissen Hauch von Humor und der passenden Ernsthaftigkeit wird an die Themen herangegangen.

Das aufgebaute Know-How durch viele Projekte und Trainings sowie die Erfahrungen aus Ausbildung, Weiterbildung und Recruiting versuchen Alex und Dominik in ihrem persönlichen Austausch der Außenwelt näher zu bringen und anderen von ihren Erfahrungsberichten zu erzählen.

Was die beiden so tun? Erfahrt es selbst bei devslove.it - der Podcast!

title: Terminal (URBAN FM)
description:
Terminal Podcast eshte prodhim i Radio Urban FM dhe Innovation Centre Kosovo me qellim te promovimit te sektorit te Teknologjisë se Informacionit dhe Komunikimit (TIK), bizneseve startup, ndërmarrësisë, rolit te diasporës, profesionet ne sektorin e TIK, promovimi i tregimeve te suksesshme te kompanive dhe individeve, orientim ne karriere dhe tema sepecifike nga fusha e STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics).

Ky podcast transmetohet live çdo të mërkurë nga ora 11:00 deri në 12:00 në Urban FM 103.5 dhe 105.5 FM. Gjithashtu, mund ta gjeni në të gjitha platformat e Urban FM online.

title: Untangling Web3
description: Untangling Web3 dives deep into the world of the next-generation Internet, exploring the groundbreaking technologies, projects, and ideas shaping the future of the Web. Join us as we demystify the concepts behind Web3 and learn how you can be relevant in this radical digital and societal transformation. This series is produced by Emma Camilleri and hosted by Jack Davies and Alec Burns.
author_name: Jack Davies, Alec Burns & Emma Camilleri

title: Galactic Pulse
description:
Galactic Pulse is a podcast that explores the latest advances in modern technology, science, and space exploration. We'll talk to experts in their fields about the latest developments, and we'll also explore the ethical and philosophical implications of these advances.

We have a sub focus on the evolution of humankind and the advancements that will soon make life expectancy much longer than current times. We'll discuss the latest research on longevity, and we'll also talk about the potential impact of these advances on our society.

However, we also cover a wide range of other topics, including:

  • The use of AI in medicine
  • The future of space travel
  • The ethical implications of gene editing
  • The potential for artificial intelligence to surpass human intelligence
  • The future of work in a world of automation
  • The impact of technology on our society

We believe that understanding the latest advances in modern science and technology is essential for anyone who wants to be informed about the future of our world. That's why we're committed to providing our listeners with the latest information on these important topics.

If you're interested in the future of our world, then you don't want to miss Galactic Pulse. Subscribe today and stay up-to-date on the latest advances in modern science and technology!

Check out these affiliate links :

AI Pictory - create Video Sales Letters with footage, music, and voiceovers, in just minutes.

title: LIVE IN THE HIVE-XR
description:
Welcome to LIVE IN THE HIVE, a groundbreaking podcast show where cutting-edge technology transforms conversations into visually captivating experiences. Get ready to immerse yourself in a world where truth is spoken, connections are made, and boundaries are pushed.

With our innovative approach, you won't just be a passive listener. As you watch and listen, you'll feel like an active participant, right there with us, soaking in the collective wisdom of our exceptional guests. Prepare to be captivated by the vibrant environment we've created, designed to enhance the depth and impact of each conversation.

But LIVE IN THE HIVE is more than just a podcast. It's a thriving community of forward-thinking individuals united by a shared passion for pushing the boundaries of knowledge and fostering meaningful connections. We invite you to join us on this exhilarating journey as we venture into the frontiers of ideas, challenge conventions, and inspire one another to reach new heights.

By subscribing to our channel, you become an integral part of our mission, contributing to the growth and transformation of our world, one podcast at a time. Together, let's explore, learn, and create positive change. Are you ready to embrace the hive mindset?

title: StandUp StandUp
description:
"Standup Standup" is a uniquely entertaining and inspiring morning show designed for the tech-savvy audience. Tailored specifically for IT professionals, the show fuses comedy with the complex world of information technology. Each episode is a delightful blend of tech-based humor, enlightening conversations with IT professionals who've dipped their toes in the comedy scene, and audience participation segments, where tech enthusiasts contribute their own laughs to the mix.

"Standup Standup" is the first-of-its-kind open-source comedy platform that redefines the start of your day with a side of humor and a dash of inspiration. Featuring daily 15-minute episodes, we're set to add a touch of levity to your work day. From amusing tech anecdotes, engaging interviews, to user-generated comedy content - we've got your morning coffee breaks covered.

Designed to break down the firewall between humor and high tech, the mission of "Standup Standup" is to light up your mornings, bring a smile to your face, and maybe even inspire you to try out your comedic chops in the IT arena. Because at "Standup Standup," we believe that while technology might run on code, the IT world runs on a good laugh. So, tune in, laugh out loud, and kick-start your day on a high note with "Standup Standup".

title: Plebchain Radio
description: Plebchain Radio is a weekly live audio show made for plebs, by plebs which focuses on the intersection of Nostr protocol and Bitcoin plebs. Quiet Warrior and Avi Burra rundown weekly news on Nostr developments, along with breaking down the "current thing" with an assortment of builders, thinkers, doers, and plebs from across the world joining in as guests.

title: Bits & Bytes
description: Tune in to Bits & Bytes hosted by Danyelle and Doug as we delve into the exciting realm of EdTech in South Windsor Public Schools. From innovative classroom tools to digital learning strategies, this podcast provides insightful discussions and success stories highlighting the transformative impact of technology on education in the South Windsor community.

title: The Human Side of B2B Technology with Noël and Noel
description: Technology is a powerful tool that can revolutionize people's lives and positively impact the world around us. Witnessing how innovation empowers individuals to create meaningful change in their own world is inspiring. Let's take some time to explore how far it has come and discover incredible stories of how technology is creating positive shifts in communities - from making health care more accessible to widening educational resources! Come along as we uncover amazing tales of transformation and get inspired by the potential tech holds for our world.

title: DevOps In Agile Way
description:
"DevOps in Agile Way" is a captivating podcast that immerses listeners in the dynamic realm of DevOps, engineering practices, value streams, Clouds, AWS, Agile methodologies, and a myriad of other captivating subjects. Through engaging conversations and expert insights, this podcast serves as a bridge between all interested parties, fostering collaboration and enabling efficient software delivery.

Join me on a deep dive into the fascinating intricacies of DevOps, where I explore cutting-edge tools, share best practices, and offer real-world anecdotes from industry experts. From continuous integration and deployment pipelines to automation of infrastructure and cloud-native architectures, I unravel the latest trends and strategies that empower organizations to achieve swift and dependable software delivery.

Our exploration extends to the Agile methodology, highlighting its seamless integration with DevOps practices and its pivotal role in driving iterative development, cross-functional teams, and customer-centric approaches. Through thought-provoking interviews, insightful case studies, and actionable tips, our podcast equips software professionals, engineers, project managers, and IT leaders with the expertise needed to seamlessly adopt DevOps in an Agile fashion.

Moreover, we delve into the vast possibilities of Clouds and AWS and unveil how these versatile cloud technologies can revolutionize development processes, amplify scalability, and optimize resource allocation. From deploying serverless applications to managing infrastructure as code, our discussions shed light on how to harness the true potential of AWS within a DevOps-centric framework.

Prepare to embark on an enriching journey with "DevOps in Agile Way," where we unlock the secrets of software engineering, DevOps methodologies, and Agile practices, empowering you to navigate the ever-evolving landscape of innovation and continuous improvement.

title: Let's talk Tech
description:
Tech podcast with industry experts.

Core topics are Lithium-ion battery industry, EV technologies, Electrification of commercial vehicles, & Career talks.

title: The Government Technology Insider Podcast
description:
Welcome to the Government Technology Insider Podcast. Join us as we delve into the exciting world where government meets innovation, and as we explore the strategies, challenges, and successes government agencies experience when implementing cutting-edge technologies. in the public sector.

In each episode, we'll bring you engaging interviews with influential industry leaders, and technology experts who are at the forefront of driving change in the government technology landscape. We’ll talk about a wide range of topics including digital government initiatives, cybersecurity, cloud computing, AI/ML, smart cities, and more! You’re going to gain valuable knowledge on how to put that technology to work to drive the mission forward. This is your comprehensive one stop shop for the ever-evolving government technology landscape.

To learn more checkout our website:

https://governmenttechnologyinsider.com/

title: The AiDVERTISING Podcast
description: I ramble on about how Ai is affecting, and will continue to affect the Creative Industry.

title: بودكاست تكية تك
description:
بودكاست تقني من تقديم عبدالله الغفيص ومحمد حدائدي وسعودي أندرويد

يناقش الأحداث التقنية بأسلوب بسيط وسهل واستضافات تقنية متنوعة.

title: Workforce 4.0
description:
Workforce 4.0 is an industry centric podcast featuring Manufacturing Executives from all industries coming together to emphasize how companies are partnering with technology to give people more meaningful work. As a passion project created by Ann Wyatt, Workforce 4.0 highlights crucial topics such as closing the talent gap, success stories of real people engaged with the latest manufacturing technology and how the manufacturing workforce can transition into these exciting new roles.

Meet Your Host:

Ann's passion is helping innovative and progressive industrial Small-Medium Enterprises and Solutions Providers in accessing top leading technical talent within an increasingly decentralized market. Achieving this goal relies on blending emerging digital capabilities with a highly personable customer user experience, resulting in bridging the talent gap and building stronger company cultures and communities. In her personal time, she advocates for:

  • Creative Workforce Development Initiatives

  • Technical and Interpersonal Skillsets Facing the Future of Work

  • Continuous Improvement of Company Culture

  • Advancement of All Things Industry 4.0

Learn More About Host Ann Wyatt

Watch Workforce 4.0 on YouTube

title: FINTECH PODCAST
description:
¡Bienvenidos a FINTECH PODCAST! El podcast de referencia para los entusiastas de la tecnología blockchain, inteligencia artificial, bitcoin, altcoins y finanzas. Únete a nosotros mientras exploramos el emocionante mundo de las criptomonedas y las innovaciones disruptivas que están transformando el panorama financiero.

Nuestro equipo de expertos analiza proyectos tecnológicos y blockchain, desglosando su funcionamiento y el impacto que podrían tener en diferentes sectores. Te mantendremos al tanto de las últimas noticias y tendencias en el mundo de las finanzas digitales, asegurándonos de que estés siempre al día con la información más relevante.

Con invitados especiales de renombre, entrevistaremos a los líderes y visionarios de la industria fintech, quienes compartirán sus conocimientos y perspectivas sobre las últimas innovaciones. Desde emprendedores hasta inversores y reguladores, exploraremos las voces que están dando forma al futuro de las finanzas.

Ya sea que seas un principiante curioso o un experto en la materia, FINTECH PODCAST es tu guía confiable para comprender los conceptos clave de la tecnología blockchain, la inteligencia artificial y las criptomonedas. Acompáñanos en este emocionante viaje mientras descubrimos cómo estas tecnologías están revolucionando el mundo financiero.

¡Suscríbete ahora a FINTECH PODCAST y mantente a la vanguardia de la evolución financiera!

Welcome to FINTECH PODCAST! The go-to podcast for enthusiasts of blockchain technology, artificial intelligence, bitcoin, altcoins, and finance. Join us as we delve into the exciting world of cryptocurrencies and the disruptive innovations that are transforming the financial landscape.

Our team of experts analyzes technology and blockchain projects, breaking down their workings and the impact they could have across different sectors. We'll keep you up to date with the latest news and trends in the digital finance world, ensuring you're always in the know with the most relevant information.

Featuring renowned special guests, we'll interview industry leaders and visionaries who will share their knowledge and insights on the latest innovations. From entrepreneurs to investors and regulators, we'll explore the voices shaping the future of finance.

Whether you're a curious beginner or an expert in the field, FINTECH PODCAST is your trusted guide to understanding key concepts in blockchain technology, artificial intelligence, and cryptocurrencies. Join us on this exciting journey as we discover how these technologies are revolutionizing the financial world.

Subscribe now to FINTECH PODCAST and stay ahead of the financial evolution!

title: Re:Design/Growth
description:
A live podcast all about creating and growing successful products in a tech business.

Every week, we welcome an experienced industry leader for a live, unstructured conversation about product. While the conversation may go anywhere, it typically revolves around product strategy & decision-making, user research, UX, definitions of product success, and how all of these fit into the bigger picture in a business.

How do you create a successful product? How do you measure it? Why is user experience important to a business? How should you decide what to build, when, and for whom?

Listen in to Re:Design/Growth to hear tech industry veterans' answers to all these questions and more!

-----

Re:Design/Growth is hosted by the co-founders of Trymata, a leader in the user insights and UX research space.

title: بودكاستك
description:
برنامج بودكاستك عبارة عن سلسلة حلقات صوتية في مجال التكنولوجيا والألعاب. يستضيف البرنامج مضيفين .يتحدثون عن أحدث التطورات التكنولوجية وأخبار الألعاب

يهدف البرنامج إلى تقديم تغطية شاملة لمجال التكنولوجيا والألعاب، وقد يركز على مواضيع محددة مثل الهواتف الذكية، الذكاء الاصطناعي، التقنيات الحديثة، أجهزة الألعاب، ألعاب الفيديو، والواقع الافتراضي، وغيرها. يمكن أن يتضمن البرنامج مقابلات مع خبراء التكنولوجيا واللاعبين المحترفين، ونقاشات عامة حول الألعاب الجديدة والتقنيات الناشئة، .واستعراض للمنتجات والأجهزة الجديدة، ونصائح وإرشادات للمستخدمين

عمومًا، يقدم برنامج بودكاستك محتوى ممتع وتثقيفي للمهتمين بهذا المجال، بطابع عفوي وممتع للمستمعين.

title: יד ברזל
description:
"יד ברזל" הוא הפודקסט שמביא אתכם לקצה העולם של העבודות הכפיים. במרכז הבמה - האנשים, המיומנויות והסיפורים של מקצועות שלא תמיד מקבלים את התשומת לב שהם ראויים לה.

המארח שלנו, עוז לוי, בן לנגר וטכנאי מטוסים בעצמו, מזמין אתכם להצצה מאחורי הקלעים של מקצועות מגוונים - מנגרים, טכנאים, פחחים, מסגרים, מלצרים ועוד. כל אחד מהם מגיע למיקרופון שלנו כדי לשתף בסיפורים, ההצלחות, האתגרים והשיעורים שלמדו בדרך.

אז אם אתם אוהבים לשמוע על יצירה, המצאה, ואת הקסם של עבודה ידנית, "יד ברזל" הוא המקום בשבילכם. הצטרפו אלינו למסע של התגלמות, השראה והתפתחות. בואו נגלה יחד את האמנות שמאחורי העבודה הכפית.

title: Discover the Power of Amazon SageMaker Autopilot: Automate Your Machine Learning Workflow
description:
Amazon SageMaker Autopilot is a machine learning service that automatically trains and tunes machine learning models. It eliminates the need for you to have expertise in machine learning, so you can focus on your business.

SageMaker Autopilot works by first automatically identifying the best machine learning algorithm for your data. It then trains and tunes hundreds of models, using different hyperparameters, to find the best model for your specific data.

title: Speechgen podcast
description:
Welcome to the SpeechGen Podcast, your definitive guide into the fascinating world of speech synthesis and AI-generated voices. Brought to you by SpeechGen.io, your trusted resource for text-to-speech solutions, we delve into revolutionary advancements each week, exploring the confluence of technology and human communication. We shed light on the science behind your favorite voice assistants and the latest breakthroughs in text-to-speech software, while introducing you to the innovators driving these transformative technologies.

Whether you're a technophile, an AI enthusiast, a linguist, or simply curious about how voices can be 'built,' there's something here for you. Each episode is packed with insightful interviews with leading experts, engaging discussions, and fascinating deep dives into the technical aspects of voice synthesis. We also highlight how these technologies are reshaping various fields, including accessibility, entertainment, education, and more.

On Speechgen podcast we are not just talking about the future; we're hearing it. Prepare to expand your understanding of artificial speech, challenge your assumptions, and marvel at the potential applications of these incredible technologies. Tune in and join the conversation on the new frontier of artificial speech and listen as we decode the language of the future, one syllable at a time.

title: AGROCHAIN
description:
AgroChain: Empoderando a Agricultura Sustentável e inteligente por meio da tecnologia Blockchain

Descrição:

Bem-vindo ao AgroChain, o podcast dedicado a explorar o potencial transformador da tecnologia blockchain no campo. Junte-se a nós enquanto nos aprofundamos em projetos e ideias inovadoras que utilizam blockchain para enfrentar os desafios do setor agrícola.

Por meio de conversas aprofundadas com especialistas, líderes da indústria e visionários, a AgroChain visa compartilhar as maneiras pelas quais essa tecnologia pode revolucionar o setor agrícola, assim como proteger o meio ambiente e mitigar efeitos das mudanças climáticas. Desde aumentar a transparência e rastreabilidade da cadeia de suprimentos até otimizar o gerenciamento de recursos e promover o comércio justo, descobrimos as imensas possibilidades para um futuro mais sustentável e eficiente na agricultura.

Seja você um agricultor, consumidor, empresário ou entusiasta no campo de novas tecnologias, o AgroChain oferece insights valiosos, histórias inspiradoras e conhecimento prático. Juntos, vamos explorar as soluções de ponta que capacitam os agricultores, promovem a gestão ambiental e cultivam um sistema alimentar mais resiliente e equitativo.

Junte-se a nós nesta jornada esclarecedora enquanto descobrimos o potencial inexplorado da tecnologia blockchain para soluções agrícolas inteligentes. Juntos, podemos construir um futuro sustentável, um bloco de cada vez.

title: EP1 | Paddy Upton - Mental Health & Technology
description:
Paddy Upton, a renowned sports psychologist and mental health advocate, has made significant contributions to the field of mental well-being in sports. With an impressive background in cricket coaching and psychology, Upton has worked with top athletes and teams, focusing not only on physical training but also on the mental aspect of performance. Paddy Upton's groundbreaking work extends beyond the sports arena. He has actively engaged with organizations, delivering insightful talks and workshops on mental health, stress management, and mindfulness. By sharing his own struggles and vulnerabilities, Upton has become a role model, encouraging individuals to seek help and support when facing mental health challenges.

Paddy Upton was contacted by The Integrator to talk about the impact of technology on mental health and how to mitigate it. Listen about his insightful conversation!

title: تكنولوجيا وتعليم
description:
مرحبًا بك في بودكاست تكنولوجيا وتعليم مع وليد البداد

في هذا البودكاست، سنتحدث بطريقة بسيطة وممتعة عن تقنيات التعليم وأثرها في حياتنا. قد نعتقد أحيانًا أن التعليم والتكنولوجيا ليسا متلازمين، وأن التعليم هو قطاع تقليدي وصعب التجديد. وربما تكون لدينا تجارب غير إيجابية في التعلم عن بُعد أو استخدام منصات التعلم الإلكتروني.

ولكن في الواقع، قطاع التعليم هو واحد من أكثر القطاعات ابتكارًا وتأثرًا بالتكنولوجيا. دعونا نفكر في أدوات الذكاء الاصطناعي وتأثيرها على التعليم، وفي أدوات الواقع المعزز والواقع الافتراضي. بغض النظر عن التحديات التي يواجهها قطاع التعليم، الا إنه قطاع شيق ويؤثر في حياة الجميع، سواء كنا طلابًا في المدارس أو متعلمين يسعون لتطوير أنفسهم أو باحثين عن المعرفة عبر محركات البحث أو وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي.

في هذا البودكاست، سنلقي نظرة على التعليم والتكنولوجيا من زوايا جديدة خارج الصفوف الدراسية التقليدية. سنناقش أحدث الابتكارات التقنية وتأثيرها على عملية التعلم. سنتعرف على تجارب تصميم المعلومات والتصميم التعليمي المبتكرة. سنستضيف أيضًا خبراء ومتخصصين في مجالات مختلفة ليشاركونا تجاربهم كمدرسين أو متعلمين أو خبراء في التكنولوجيا التي تؤثر على قطاع التعليم.

هذا البودكاست مخصص لجميع الأشخاص الذين يرغبون في فهم عملية التعلم واكتساب المهارات الجديدة، بالإضافة إلى الأشخاص المهتمين بالتكنولوجيا والتعليم.

title: BIOSA
description: El objetivo del programa "Biomanejo Integral Orgánico Sustentable para la Agricultura" es brindar información y orientación completa a los agricultores y profesionales del sector agrícola sobre las mejores prácticas, técnicas y tecnologías relacionadas con el manejo integral orgánico y sostenible en la agricultura. El programa se enfoca en promover el uso responsable y eficiente de recursos naturales, fomentando prácticas agrícolas respetuosas con el medio ambiente y que generen beneficios económicos, sociales y ambientales a largo plazo. A través de entrevistas con expertos, testimonios de agricultores exitosos y la presentación de casos de estudio, el programa busca empoderar a la audiencia para adoptar en sus cultivos métodos sustentables, reducir el impacto negativo en el ecosistema y contribuir a la seguridad alimentaria global. Además, el "Biomanejo Integral Orgánico Sustentable para la Agricultura" busca crear conciencia sobre la importancia de la agricultura orgánica y sostenible, así como motivar a los agricultores a adoptar prácticas que protejan y regeneren los recursos naturales para las futuras generaciones. Con enfoque en la innovación y la ciencia, el programa también explorará las últimas investigaciones y desarrollos en el campo de la agricultura sostenible y compartirá conocimientos prácticos para lograr una producción agrícola eficiente y responsable en armonía con el entorno natural.

title: CEO Cheat Sheet
description:
After dropping my software engineering career six years ago, I started my first business - a software development agency called StartupCraft. After three years of operation, the company surpassed $2m in revenue and continued steady year-to-year growth. At 30, I stopped actively managing the agency and focused on the ultimate tool to run the entire system - Worklair.

My secret to successful growth lies in viewing the business as one extensive program. As developers use third-party solutions to drive their applications, businesses use pre-made solutions to nurture and empower their operations. I wondered how other agency owners run their businesses and decided to embark on a journey.

CEO Cheat Sheet podcast is an exploration expedition into the heart of profitable agency businesses. The podcast guests are successful business owners who share their stories with a heavy focus on the tools they use. We are jumping right under the hood of the currently operating businesses to tap into a valuable and helpful list of devices, solutions, tips, and tricks you can evaluate, copy, and start using today.

Thank you for listening!

Follow the podcast if you enjoy it!

The framework we use: https://worklair.io

title: Advance artificial technology by Critical Minerals Refining
description:
Critical minerals RSS feeds provide up-to-date information and news related to critical minerals. Critical minerals are natural resources that are essential for various industries, including technology, renewable energy, defense, and manufacturing. These minerals play a crucial role in the production of electronic devices, batteries, electric vehicles, and advanced materials.

RSS (Really Simple Syndication) feeds are a way to aggregate and distribute content from multiple sources in a standardized format. Critical minerals RSS feeds collect and deliver news articles, reports, research papers, industry updates, and market trends specifically focused on critical minerals.

By subscribing to critical minerals RSS feeds, individuals, researchers, industry professionals, and policymakers can stay informed about the latest developments in critical minerals supply and demand, exploration and production activities, policy changes, environmental concerns, and technological advancements.

These RSS feeds can provide valuable insights into the global critical minerals landscape, including information on mineral reserves, mining projects, trade dynamics, price fluctuations, and emerging technologies for mineral extraction and processing. They help stakeholders make informed decisions, understand market trends, assess investment opportunities, and anticipate potential challenges or disruptions in the critical minerals sector.

Overall, critical minerals RSS feeds serve as a valuable resource for anyone interested in staying updated on the latest news and developments in the critical minerals industry, which is vital for sustainable economic growth, technological innovation, and the transition to a greener future.

title: The Power Of Creative Entrepreneurship
description:
Creative entrepreneurship is a force that drives innovation, transforms industries, and shapes the world we live in. It is the fusion of creativity and business acumen, where individuals harness their imaginative ideas and turn them into successful ventures.

At its core, creative entrepreneurship is about pushing boundaries, challenging norms, and bringing fresh perspectives. It is about thinking outside the box and finding unique solutions to problems. Creative entrepreneurs are unafraid to take risks and embrace failure as a stepping stone to success.

One of the most potent aspects of creative entrepreneurship is its ability to disrupt established industries. It could revolutionize how we live, work, and interact with the world. Creative entrepreneurs are at the forefront of driving change and shaping the future, from breakthrough technologies to groundbreaking artistic endeavors.

Moreover, creative entrepreneurship is not limited to a specific field or industry. It encompasses various disciplines, including art, design, technology, and media. Whether you are a painter, a software developer, or a fashion designer, there is room for creative entrepreneurship in every domain.

The power of creative entrepreneurship lies in its ability to transform ideas into tangible realities. It empowers individuals to bring their visions to life and create something unique and innovative. It catalyzes personal and professional growth, requiring individuals to constantly learn, adapt, and evolve.

In today's rapidly changing world, where innovation is the key to staying relevant, creative entrepreneurship has become more critical than ever. It is a driving force behind economic growth and societal progress. By embracing the power of creative entrepreneurship, individuals can unleash their full potential and make a lasting impact on the world around them.

Want to know more? Visit @

Creative Digital Goods

"Innovative Digital Products for the Creator's Economy"

All About Annette

"The Creator Herself"

Thank you for listening!

title: Palabras que laten
description:
Palabras que Laten

Sumérgete en el mundo de las conversaciones íntimas y reveladoras en "Palabras que Laten", el pódcast que te lleva a explorar las historias detrás de las personas. Presentado por Iván David Castaño, este espacio te invita a adentrarte en las mentes y corazones de individuos fascinantes, mientras comparten sus experiencias, sueños y desafíos en un ambiente de confianza.

Cada episodio es un viaje profundo hacia los pensamientos y emociones de nuestros invitados, quienes comparten sus relatos de vida, inspiraciones y reflexiones. Desde artistas hasta científicos, exploradores urbanos y soñadores, "Palabras que Laten" te ofrece una ventana a las vidas que laten en silencio detrás de la superficie.

Únete a nosotros mientras desentrañamos los secretos y las pasiones que conforman a estas personas extraordinarias. Prepárate para ser cautivado por las historias que tejen nuestra realidad y descubrirás que las palabras tienen el poder de latir con la fuerza de mil corazones.

Sintoniza "Palabras que Laten" y permite que las voces de nuestros invitados te guíen a través de un viaje de conexión humana más allá de lo convencional.

In a world that's updating faster than your favorite IDE, and where you're more likely to speak to a machine than a human, it's easy to forget the simple art of 'being.' title: Grown Up Game Plan
description:
Welcome to Grown Up Game Plan, the podcast where we dive into the thrilling world of sports, dissect the latest in technology, and navigate the maze of modern parenting. I'm your host, Bill Porter, joined by the tech-savvy guru himself, Danny Harris. Together, we'll be your trusted guides as we explore the multifaceted aspects of adulthood in the 21st century.

In each episode, we blend our passion for sports, our fascination with cutting-edge technology, and our insights into the ever-evolving realm of parenting. We don't just scratch the surface; we take you deep into the game.

But that's not all – we believe that understanding the world today requires more than just a playbook. That's why we're committed to tying in current events, whether it's a groundbreaking technological advancement, a nail-biting sports match, or a parenting trend that's making waves.

To bring you the most authoritative perspectives, we invite industry experts to the table. Whether it's a tech innovator changing the way we live, a sports analyst dissecting the game, or a parenting guru helping us navigate the chaos of raising kids, we've got them on speed dial.

Expect insightful discussions, thought-provoking debates, and plenty of laughs along the way. From the Super Bowl to the latest smartphone release to the challenges of raising the next generation, we've got your grown-up game plan covered.

So, join us on this exciting journey through the crossroads of sports, technology, and parenting. Whether you're a die-hard sports fan, a tech enthusiast, a dedicated parent, or all of the above, Grown Up Game Plan is your go-to podcast for staying in the know and finding your path in this dynamic world of grown-up responsibilities. Hit that subscribe button and let's tackle adulthood together!

description:
Bienvenue dans "Portrait Urbain", une série de vidéos où je mêle la photographie de rue, les rencontres artistiques et les interviews intimes. Chaque mois, je choisis un DJ/Producteur pour une expérience unique en plein air. À l'aide de ma GoPro fixée sur ma poitrine, plongez dans mes pas et découvrez le processus de création de portraits saisissants au cœur des rues animées de villes différentes. Vous serez témoin de la fusion magique entre l'artiste et l'environnement urbain, tandis que je saisis l'essence de leur personnalité à travers des clichés uniques. En plus des photos, chaque vidéo est accompagnée d'une interview avec l'artiste, où ils partagent leur parcours, leurs inspirations et leurs rêves. Joignez-vous à moi pour une immersion totale dans l'univers créatif de ces talents et laissez-vous inspirer par leurs histoires captivantes.

Vous pourrez écouter PU de n'importe où et n'importe quand !

title: Eye On AI
description:
Welcome to 'Eye on AI', your audio compass guiding you through the intricate maze of Artificial Intelligence. As you tune in, you'll embark on an auditory journey that delves deep beneath the surface of AI, shedding light on the brilliance of its innovations and the dilemmas it presents.

Have you ever marveled at how Siri or Alexa understands your commands, or pondered how your Netflix recommendations are so spot on? How about the algorithm that tailors your social media feed, making you lose track of time? It's all a result of the magic weaved by AI—a blend of mathematics, programming, and often, sheer genius.

But AI isn't just about algorithms or technological innovations. It's also about the challenges it presents, the ethical tightropes it has us treading, and the sociopolitical implications it carries. As machines become increasingly intelligent, surpassing human abilities in various fields, where does this leave us—the original thinkers? 'Eye on AI' doesn't shy away from these tough questions. Instead, it invites them, fostering a platform where we can discuss, debate, and decipher the larger implications of this tech phenomenon.

From the latest breakthroughs that have scholars buzzing to real-world applications that touch our everyday lives, we’ll uncover it all. And it's not just for the tech-savvy. Whether you're an AI aficionado or just curious about that voice inside your GPS, we aim to make AI approachable, understandable, and exciting for all.

So, if you've ever been intrigued by how AI is reshaping industries, from healthcare to finance, or if you've pondered what the future might look like in an AI-dominated world, this podcast is your ticket. We promise captivating conversations, intriguing insights, and perhaps, a new way to look at the digital world around you.

Join us, as we embark on this voyage, charting the vast ocean of Artificial Intelligence, a realm where possibilities are endless and the future is now. Subscribe and become a fellow explorer of the AI frontier, navigating its wonders and challenges together. Welcome aboard 'Eye on AI', where every episode promises a deeper understanding of the world's most transformative technology.

title: Safe & Sound in the Digital Age
description:
Description:

Welcome to "Safe & Sound in the Digital Age," the podcast where we unravel the intricate web of digital transformation and cybersecurity to guide you towards a future where you and your business thrive securely in the digital landscape.

In a world that's rapidly evolving, the digital realm is where innovation, opportunity, and risk converge. As we navigate this landscape, it's crucial to stay informed, empowered, and vigilant. Hosted by the insightful and bestselling author, Nicholas P. Lorizio, whose book "Digitalization: The New Normal of the Post-Pandemic World" laid the groundwork for understanding the digital revolution, this podcast is your compass for safe passage through the digital age.

What to Expect:

Join us as we embark on a journey deep into the heart of digital transformation and cybersecurity. With each episode, we explore the stories, strategies, and solutions that define the intersection of technology and business.

Here's a taste of what you can expect:

*1. Digital Transformation Chronicles: Discover how leading companies are reshaping their operations, strategies, and customer experiences through digital innovation. We delve into their journeys, successes, and the lessons learned along the way.

*2. Cybersecurity Safeguards: In today's interconnected world, cyber threats are ever-present. We go beyond the headlines to explore the evolving landscape of cybersecurity. Learn from experts and industry leaders about the latest threats, vulnerabilities, and strategies to protect your business and personal data. Our mission is to arm you with knowledge, so you can fortify your digital defenses.

*3. Insightful Interviews: Our show is enriched by engaging conversations with thought leaders, industry pioneers, and entrepreneurs who've navigated the digital frontier. Hear their stories, gain access to their expertise, and uncover their insights.

*4. Practical Guidance: We understand that knowledge without action is only half the battle. That's why each episode provides actionable takeaways and practical tips you can implement immediately. From securing your network to optimizing your digital strategy, we're here to help.

*5. Digitalization Spotlight: We revisit key themes from Nicholas P. Lorizio's book, "Digitalization: The New Normal of the Post-Pandemic World." Gain a deeper understanding of how digitalization is reshaping industries, societies, and economies worldwide. Explore the implications and possibilities of the new normal.

*6. Interactive Community: Our commitment to your digital well-being goes beyond the podcast. Join our vibrant online community, where listeners like you share experiences, ask questions, and collaborate on digital challenges. Together, we create a network of support and knowledge exchange.

Why "Safe & Sound"?

Our podcast title, "Safe & Sound in the Digital Age," captures our mission: to empower you in navigating the digital landscape confidently and securely amid today's era of innovation and disruption. Knowledge is your strongest defense.

Our commitment is clear: provide you with insights, stories, and strategies not only for survival but for thriving in this digital era. Whether you're a business owner, tech enthusiast, or simply curious about the digital world, "Safe & Sound in the Digital Age" offers valuable insights. Join us on this exhilarating expedition through the digital age, where we'll unlock the secrets to thriving, innovating, and securing your place in a world where the digital and physical realms converge.

Subscribe now and embark on this journey of discovery, transformation, and security.

Welcome to "Safe & Sound in the Digital Age."

title: What Is LDAP Search And How Does It Work
description:
In this episode of the Foxpass podcast, we're going to talk about LDAP Search. LDAP Search is a powerful tool that can be used to find users, groups, and other objects in an LDAP directory, such as Active Directory. We'll discuss what LDAP Search is, how it works, and how to use it to find the information you need.

We'll start by discussing what LDAP is and how it works. LDAP is a lightweight directory access protocol that is used to store and manage information about users, groups, and other objects. LDAP directories are often used in enterprise environments to manage user access to resources.

LDAP Search is a tool that can be used to find objects in an LDAP directory. It uses a filter language to specify the criteria for the search. The filter language can be used to search for objects based on their attributes, such as their username, email address, or group membership.

We'll discuss how to use the LDAP Search tool to find users, groups, and other objects in Active Directory. We'll also discuss some advanced LDAP Search techniques, such as using multiple filters and sorting the results.

In conclusion, LDAP Search is a powerful tool that can be used to find users, groups, and other objects in an LDAP directory. It is a valuable tool for system administrators and other users who need to manage user access to resources.

Thanks for listening to this episode of the Foxpass podcast. If you have any questions about LDAP Search, please leave a comment below.

title: CYBR DATES - Cybersecurity, Datenschutz & mehr
description:
CYBR DATES ist das etwas andere Podcastformat des Netzwerks CYBR 360 - die Initiative für digitale Sicherheit im Saarland.

Im Podcast treffen sich immer zwei Teilnehmer:innen aus Wirtschaft, Wissenschaft oder Politik aus dem Saarland zu einem Blind Date. Das bedeutet, sie wissen vor der Aufnahme nicht, mit wem sie sich heute unterhalten werden. Eines bleibt allerdings immer gleich: das Thema! Fokus der Diskussion ist immer die digitale Sicherheit.

Um das Gespräch anzuheizen, werden Fragen gestellt, die anschließend diskutiert werden können.

CYBR360 geht auf die Initiative der Netzwerkstelle Digitalisierung (DiNet) der Landesregierung zurück. Als Netzwerk sind wir offen für Beratende, für Start-Ups und Forschende, für Unternehmen aus der Anwendung gleichermaßen wie aus der Entwicklung. Mehr erfahren: https://cybr360.saarland/

Der Podcast wird produziert und organisiert vom East Side Fab e.V.. Das East Side Fab ist Netzwerk und Anlaufstelle für alle, die aus Ideen nachhaltige Innovation machen möchten. Als Innovation Hub realisieren sie in Innovationsprojekte neue Geschäftsmodelle und Konzepte rund um Zukunftsthemen. Der Verein wird gefördert vom Ministerium für Wirtschaft, Innovation, Digitales und Energie des Saarlandes und trägt sich zusätzlich aus Mitgliedsbeiträgen. Mehr erfahren: https://eastsidefab.de/

Zum Impressum: https://cybr360.saarland/impressum

title: The TechTorchbearers
description:
The TechTorchbearers is a podcast channel dedicated to exploring the intersection of technology, entrepreneurship, and social responsibility. In a rapidly evolving digital landscape, our mission is to shed light on the innovators, thought leaders, and trailblazers who are committed to using technology as a force for good.

Join us as we delve deep into conversations with visionaries who are shaping the tech industry with a strong sense of ethical and social responsibility. We explore their journeys, insights, and the impact of their work on society. From sustainable startups and socially conscious entrepreneurs to groundbreaking technological advancements, we strive to inspire and inform our listeners.

Through engaging discussions and thought-provoking interviews, "Illuminating the Future of Responsible Tech" aims to empower individuals and businesses to make informed choices, embrace responsible innovation, and contribute positively to the future of technology. Join us on this enlightening journey toward a brighter, more ethical tech-driven future.
